Aurora\" height=\"801\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Inns of Aurora</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\"><li><strong>Whether you crave crystal-clear fresh waters, paddling a canoe, fishing, or want to enjoy fall foliage with water views, a lake trip makes it easy to savor the great outdoors.</strong></li><li><strong>We rounded up the best lakefront getaways in the US, from rustic lodges to family-friendly resorts, and romantic B&#38;Bs, which all provide direct access to top lakes.</strong></li><li><strong>Prices range from $119 to $299 to start for hotels that are well-rated and boast amenities like porches, fireplaces, dining, and access to water sports and outdoor activities.</strong></li><li><strong>We also included up-to-date COVID policies for each property.</strong></li><li><strong>Read more: <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-mountain-resorts-us\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">The best US mountain resorts for all seasons</a></strong></li></ul><p>As domestic travel picks back up following shutdowns due to the novel coronavirus, many Americans are looking for ways to enjoy the outdoors without going too far from home.&#160;</p><p>Rather than far-flung bucket-list trips that require <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/is-flying-safe-right-now-coronavirus\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">long flights and airports that risk exposure to the virus</a>, many travelers are considering <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-rv-rentals\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">renting RVs</a> for <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-road-trips-us\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">scenic road trips</a>, <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-us-campsites\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">outdoor camping</a> or <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-glamping-us\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">glamping</a> adventures, <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-hotels-near-national-parks\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">hotels in or near national parks</a>, <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-mountain-resorts-us\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">mountain resorts</a>, or other regional and domestic travel that's <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-places-near-big-cities\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">easily accessible from major hubs</a>.</p><p>These nature-filled trips all trade crowded cities for wide-open outdoor spaces that make it easier to practice social distancing and travel as safely as can be guaranteed right now. Of course, without a vaccine, it's impossible to guarantee safety. Also, consider whether you're leaving or traveling to a hotspot, so as not to contribute to infection spikes. And follow guidelines from the CDC and WHO such as wearing a mask, washing your hands, and social distancing, no matter where you go.</p><p>However, there's something especially idyllic about a lake vacation. Like the best memories from summer camp, lake getaways conjure images of paddling in calm, crystal-clear waters surrounded by forests and wildlife, and plenty of fresh, crisp air. A lake trip can be a relaxing romantic retreat or an outdoorsy family adventure.&#160;</p><p>We rounded up some of the best lakefront stays spanning the US including charming inns with cozy fireplaces and wide porches, as well as mountain resorts with all sorts of activities including biking, hiking, fishing, golf, and more.&#160;</p><p>We carefully selected properties based on the following criteria:</p><ol><li><strong>All hotels are, of course, lakefront. But every property also offers proximity to nature and access to outdoor activities.</strong></li><li><strong>We looked for affordable properties and rates range from $119 to $299 to start in the fall season to suit a variety of needs and budgets.</strong></li><li><strong>All hotels have high ratings on trusted traveler sites such as <a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.tripadvisor.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow nofollow noopener sponsored sponsored\">Trip Advisor</a>&#160;and&#160;<a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6776&awinaffid=257137&p=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.booking.com%2Findex.en-gb.html&clickref=1591260096776a58or8io7%7Cxid:fr1591260100351fig260100351fig\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow nofollow noopener sponsored sponsored\">Booking.com</a>.</strong></li><li><strong>Every property is a well-appointed stay with excellent amenities from private porches and in-room fireplaces to delectable farm-to-table restaurants on-site.</strong></li></ol><p>Keep reading to discover our favorite lakefront getaways, including their current COVID policies, as well as everything else you should know about booking safe vacations during COVID-19.</p><h2>These are the best lakefront getaways in the US, sorted by price from low to high.</h2>\n<div id=\"slideshow\">\n\tThe Lodge at Whitefish Lake - Whitefish, Montana\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5ed959c43f73701898514bcc?format=jpeg\" alt=\"The Lodge at Whitefish Lake\" height=\"886\" width=\"1181\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Booking.com</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h2><a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6776&#38;awinaffid=257137&#38;p=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.booking.com%2Fhotel%2Fus%2Flodge-at-whitefish-lake.en-gb.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Book The Lodge at Whitefish Lake starting at $119 per night</a></h2><p>Set on the edge of sparkling Whitefish Lake in Montana, and adjacent to a 30-acre nature preserve, this plush hideaway also makes a great base to explore Glacier National Park, about an hour away by car.</p><p>Spend the afternoon on the private beach and swimming area, or rent kayaks, paddle boards, Jet-Skis, and sailboats at the hotel's marina. There's also lakefront pool and hot tub where you can soak up the stunning mountain scenery.&#160;&#160;</p><p>Inside, the rustic-style main lodge features wood-burning stone fireplaces and comfy leather seating, and there's a cozy library stocked with board games. The swanky Boat Club restaurant turns out stellar local fare &#8212; think elk meatballs and bison sliders &#8212; in a gorgeous lakefront dining room, while the Boat Club serves a casual menu inside by the fireplace, or out on the seasonal lakeside deck.</p><p>Accommodations are located in two separate lodges, plus spacious condominiums set alongside the lake. Rooms in the Viking Lodge are classic in style with wood furnishings and gas fireplaces and have views of the surrounding forest (though not the lake). Studio suites in the Main Lodge measure 600 square feet and feature balconies and kitchenettes; request one with a lake view unless you want to face the pool.</p><p><strong><a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g45402-d251765-Reviews-Lodge_at_Whitefish_Lake-Whitefish_Montana.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Trip Advisor</a> Ranking:</strong> 4 out of 18 hotels in Whitefish</p><p><strong><a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6776&#38;awinaffid=257137&#38;p=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.booking.com%2Fhotel%2Fus%2Flodge-at-whitefish-lake.en-gb.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Booking.com</a> Rating:</strong> 9.1 out of 10</p><p><strong>Pros:</strong> If the seasonal outdoor pool is closed, there's also an indoor heated pool with a waterfall. A free shuttle takes guests to downtown Whitefish and Big Mountain, which is especially handy for skiing. Rooms overall are large and the fireplaces are a nice touch.</p><p><strong>Cons:</strong> Rooms in the Viking Lodge are a bit of a walk to the main lodge and the lake.</p><p><strong>COVID-19 cleaning procedures:&#160;</strong>This hotel is currently open and accepting reservations with the following new rules in effect:</p><ul><li>A face covering must be worn by all individuals when in a place of business or waiting in line, outdoors with 20 or greater guests, or when physical distancing cannot be maintained.</li><li>Hotel staff receive ongoing communication and enhanced operation protocols and completes a health and wellness screening upon arrival for work.</li><li>All high-touch areas are treated with additional disinfectant/sanitizer and with increased frequency. These areas include public door handles, handrails, elevator surfaces, shuttle vehicles, lobby areas, restrooms, and more.</li><li>Hand sanitizer is available for use in hotel common areas.</li><li>In-room amenities such as glassware and mugs are replaced with pre-packaged, disposable alternatives.</li><li>Physical distancing is facilitated by a plexiglass shield separating guests from front desk personnel. Indicators show 6-foot distances for clients awaiting service.&#160;</li><li>Reduced restaurant seating and table arrangements provide physical distance between guests that are not together.</li></ul>\n\tCheyenne Mountain Colorado Springs, A Dolce Resort - Colorado Springs, Colorado\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5ed95a8d5af6cc038f53d2b9?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Credit_ Cheyenne Mountain Resort\" height=\"844\" width=\"1125\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Cheyenne Mountain Resort</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h2><a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6776&#38;awinaffid=257137&#38;p=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.booking.com%2Fhotel%2Fus%2Fcheyenne-mountain-resort.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Book Cheyenne Mountain Colorado Springs, A Dolce Resort, starting at $132 per night</a></h2><p>Surrounded by the towering mountains of Pikes Peak and home to a 35-acre private lake, this grand resort offers a huge array of family-friendly activities. Laze on the sandy beach, play beach volleyball, or take out a complimentary kayak, paddleboard, or pedal boat to explore the lake.</p><p>There are four seasonal outdoor pools, one of them Olympic-sized, plus a kiddie pool and waterslide, as well as an indoor pool. Other amenities include outdoor basketball courts, indoor/outdoor tennis, and a Pete Dye-designed golf course, plus three restaurants.</p><p>The rustic-style resort blends warm wood and stone, best seen in the grand timbered lobby outfitted with a wood-burning fireplace. Rooms, however, are thoroughly modern, done up in a neutral tan and gray palette with balconies or patios. Entry-level Standard Double Queen rooms measure 430 square feet and overlook the hotel courtyard. Upgrade to a Deluxe room for mountain views. Wyndham Rewards members can use or earn points for their stay.</p><p><strong><a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g33364-d82870-Reviews-Cheyenne_Mountain_Resort_Colorado_Springs_A_Dolce_Resort-Colorado_Springs_El_Paso_County_.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Trip Advisor</a> Ranking:</strong> 47 out of 113 hotels in Colorado Springs</p><p><strong><a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6776&#38;awinaffid=257137&#38;p=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.booking.com%2Fhotel%2Fus%2Fcheyenne-mountain-resort.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Booking.com</a> Rating:</strong> 8.4 out of 10</p><p><strong>Pros:</strong> Cheyenne Mountain offers stunning mountain scenery and a huge range of on-site amenities, many of which are included in the rate.</p><p><strong>Cons:</strong> Some guests complained about the poor insulation and noise from other rooms. The signage around the resort could also be improved.</p><p><strong>COVID-19 cleaning procedures:&#160;</strong>This hotel is currently open and accepting reservations with the following procedures in place:&#160;</p><ul><li>Face masks are required for all individuals over 10 years old while entering or moving within any indoor public space. Masks are not required in your guestroom or when consuming food or beverage purchased in restaurants.</li><li>Only registered guests are allowed on resort property and in guest rooms.</li><li>Seating in public spaces shall allow at least six feet of separation and may be subject to occupancy restrictions in order to achieve appropriate social distancing.</li><li>Groups should not congregate in any public areas of the hotel, and will be asked to disperse if necessary.</li><li>Elevators are limited to occupancy by 2 people or 1 traveling group at a time.</li><li>Daily housekeeping service will not be available during guest stays. All in-room amenities are available in the room except for bathrobes, reading material, and ceramic cups.</li><li>Services such as the pool, golf, spa, fitness, and other amenities are operating with reduced capacity or reservation-only use.</li><li>In order to meet new health and safety challenges presented by COVID-19, Wyndham Hotels and Resorts has implemented a 'Count on Us' initiative. In partnership with Ecolab, a Global leader with nearly 100 years of experience in water, hygiene, and infection prevention technologies and services, all Wyndham Hotels and Resorts have implemented the use of Ecolab's EPA-approved disinfectant products in all hotel guest rooms and public spaces.</li></ul>\n\tThe Aurora Inn - Finger Lakes, New York\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5ed959fc3f737018ce41b7d6?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Inns of Aurora\" height=\"800\" width=\"1067\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Inns of Aurora</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h2><a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6776&#38;awinaffid=257137&#38;p=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.booking.com%2Fhotel%2Fus%2Finns-of-aurora.en-gb.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Book Aurora Inn starting at $172 per night</a></h2><p>New York's Finger Lakes region is known for its wineries, craft breweries, and gorgeous glacial lakes. The largest, Cayuga Lake, is the setting for this collection of five beautifully preserved historic inns, located in the quaint 18th-century village of Aurora.</p><p>Among them is a magnificent stone mansion built in 1858 by Edwin Barber Morgan, the co-founder of the New York Times, and the 1904 Colonial-style Zabriskie House, featuring a three-story staircase and a 22-person wood-paneled dining room.</p><p>Choose from 54 rooms, or for a more exclusive stay, three of the houses are available for private rental. Decor and amenities vary depending on each inn, but all have been impeccably restored with original wood floors, sweeping staircases, and marble fireplaces, while lakefront lawns and wraparound porches let guests soak up the water views.&#160;&#160;</p><p>The lowest-priced rooms are in Wallcourt Hall, a former schoolhouse that also served as a workshop for tableware designer MacKenzie-Childs. The 16 rooms are decorated in a modern style with bright furnishings and contemporary artwork.</p><p>A more historic feel can be found in the period-style rooms of the Aurora Inn, some of which feature gas fireplaces and direct lake views. It's also where you'll find the property's signature restaurant, 1833 Kitchen &#38; Bar, which serves a farm-to-table menu in a lovely wood-paneled dining room.&#160;</p><p><strong><a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g29847-d571133-Reviews-The_Aurora_Inn-Aurora_Finger_Lakes_New_York.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Trip Advisor</a> Ranking:</strong> 1 out of 6 hotels in Aurora</p><p><strong><a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6776&#38;awinaffid=257137&#38;p=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.booking.com%2Fhotel%2Fus%2Finns-of-aurora.en-gb.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Booking.com</a> Rating:</strong> 9.6 out of 10</p><p><strong>Pros:</strong> Included with your stay are the use of paddle boards, canoes, and kayaks for lake outings, plus bicycles and helmets, and binoculars and birding cards. There's a free daily wine happy hour, free snacks, and a morning coffee basket delivered to your door.</p><p><strong>Cons:</strong> The town of Aurora has limited shopping and dining options.</p><p><strong>COVID-19 cleaning procedures:&#160;</strong>This hotel is currently open and accepting reservations with the following policies in place:&#160;</p><ul><li>In compliance with guidance from New York State, the hotel is not accepting guests traveling from <a href=\"https://coronavirus.health.ny.gov/home\">restricted states</a>. Reservations will be canceled without penalty.</li><li>Housekeeping services will continue with special attention paid to daily disinfection of guest room and public spaces, including door handles, countertops, phones, light switches, thermostats, and electronic controls.</li><li>Hand sanitizing stations are available throughout the resort.</li><li>Staff members are required to wear masks at all times. Guests must carry a mask at all times and utilize it when entering indoor spaces or where six feet of social distancing is unable to be maintained.</li><li>Turndown service is temporarily suspended and non-essential decorative items are removed including throw blankets and pillows.</li><li>Dining venues are open with limited socially distant seating, and for take-out.</li><li>Fitness classes and other group activities are temporarily suspended but contactless amenities are offered including watercraft, bicycles, games, art supplies, and more.</li></ul>\n\tLakeway Resort and Spa - Lakeway, Texas\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5ed95abff34d050b5e324e18?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Lakeway Resort and Spa\" height=\"844\" width=\"1125\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Booking.com</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h2><a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6776&#38;awinaffid=257137&#38;p=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.booking.com%2Fhotel%2Fus%2Flakeway-resort-and-spa.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Book Lakeway Resort and Spa starting at $179 per night</a></h2><p>Twenty miles outside Austin, the busy highways give way to tranquil rolling hills and the pristine lakes of Texas Hill Country. Lake Travis, a reservoir on the Colorado River, is one of the most popular, given its proximity to the capital. Tucked into the hillside and directly overlooking the lake, this modern four-star resort is a favorite with families thanks to its huge range of children's amenities.&#160;</p><p>Multiple outdoor pools and a swim-up bar offer fantastic lake views, while a dedicated kid's pool features a water slide and a splash pad and nightly family-friendly movies. A free indoor Kid Zone includes bouncy houses, games, and a mini putt-putt. Texas Sailing and the Lakeway Marina are also located on-property where you can rent boats, Jet-Skis, kayaks, and paddle boards to explore the lake's 270 miles of shoreline.</p><p>TR Restaurant serves Southwestern cuisine in a rustic dining room with tall windows overlooking Lake Travis. The casual Back Porch bar, decked out with leather chairs and an antler chandelier, features an extensive craft beer list; head out to the balcony to sip a cold one while soaking up sunset views over the lake.</p><p>Contemporary rooms are decorated in a soothing palette of gray and cream, with swirling blue carpeting and punches of color in the local artwork dotting the walls. Entry-level Deluxe Rooms measure 350 square feet and feature hillside views; those with lake views come at a premium.&#160;</p><p><strong><a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g56130-d98445-Reviews-Lakeway_Resort_and_Spa-Lakeway_Texas.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Trip Advisor</a> Ranking:</strong> 2 out of 4 hotels in Lakeway</p><p><strong><a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6776&#38;awinaffid=257137&#38;p=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.booking.com%2Fhotel%2Fus%2Flakeway-resort-and-spa.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Booking.com</a> Rating:</strong> 8.5 out of 10</p><p><strong>Pros:</strong> Lots of complimentary family-friendly amenities keep the little ones busy, while grown-ups can enjoy the peace and quiet at three adults-only pools. Guests who stayed in lake-fronting rooms praised the amazing views.</p><p><strong>Cons:</strong> There is a daily $35 resort fee. There are no lakeside beaches.&#160;</p><p><strong>COVID-19 cleaning procedures:&#160;</strong>This hotel is currently open and accepting reservations with the following procedures in place:&#160;</p><ul><li>Enhanced cleaning focuses on specific guest room touch points utilizing Procter and Gamble cleaning/disinfecting products and an 'Ultra Touch' inspection process.</li><li>Guests are required to wear a face covering when visiting the premises and follow social distancing protocols. This order is in effect until August 15, 2020.&#160;</li><li>Strategically placed disinfecting stations are available from the doorsteps to the elevators with extra attention paid to cleaning high-touch areas in common spaces and guest rooms including door handles, push plates, hand rails, luggage carts, countertops, tabletops, chairs, elevator buttons, computer workstations, phones, and more.</li><li>Contactless food and beverage delivery is offered to guest rooms.&#160;</li><li>Pools and public restrooms are open with increased sanitization. The fitness center requires a reservation.</li><li>&#160;</li></ul>\n\tLake Morey Resort - Fairlee, Vermont\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5ed95a232618b90e27056bb8?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Lake Morey Resort\" height=\"683\" width=\"911\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Booking.com</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h2><a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6776&#38;awinaffid=257137&#38;p=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.booking.com%2Fhotel%2Fus%2Flake-morey-resort.en-gb.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Book Lake Morey Resort starting at $209 per night</a></h2><p>Nestled in the foothills of Vermont's Green Mountains, this family-owned retreat takes full advantage of its lakefront location, with more than half of its 130 rooms offering lake views.</p><p>Explore the 600-acre mountain lake by kayak, canoe, or paddleboard, or hop on a bike and ride around the shore. Other on-site activities include tennis, volleyball, and pickleball, and there's also an indoor pool, billiards room, and movie theater. The resort is home to a championship 18-hole golf course, where the Vermont Open Golf Championship has been held for over five decades.</p><p>Originally built in 1905, the resort has been thoroughly modernized but still has a homey feel with classic furnishings and lots of warm wood accents. The seasonal Lakeside Restaurant offers regional cuisine with lake views, while the cozy Steamboat Lounge serves pub fare and craft beers.&#160;&#160;</p><p>Rooms are tasteful, though not particularly stylish, with wood furnishings and red and gold accents. Entry-level Classic Guest Rooms feature two Double or Queen-sized beds with garden or golf course views but consider upgrading to a spacious Lakeview Terrace room for a private balcony and stunning lake views.</p><p><strong><a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g57262-d100058-Reviews-Lake_Morey_Resort-Fairlee_Vermont.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Trip Advisor</a> Ranking:</strong> 1 out of 2 B&#38;B/Inns in Fairlee</p><p><strong><a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6776&#38;awinaffid=257137&#38;p=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.booking.com%2Fhotel%2Fus%2Flake-morey-resort.en-gb.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow nofollow noopener sponsored sponsored\">Booking.com</a> Rating:</strong> 9.5 out of 10</p><p><strong>Pros:</strong> There is no resort fee and most equipment for activities is included in the rate, except for boat rentals and golf course fees.&#160;</p><p><strong>Cons:</strong> Meals at the restaurant can be pricey and some guests noted that the service was slow.</p><p><strong>COVID-19 cleaning procedures:&#160;</strong>This hotel is currently open and accepting reservations with the following policies in place:&#160;</p><ul><li>Guests have the ability to pre-pay their stay to limit time at the front desk. Only one person may wait at the front desk to provide six feet of physical distancing. Plexiglass shields have been installed.</li><li>To limit cross-contamination, luggage storage will not be provided.</li><li>In order to maximize the time between guests and cleaning rooms, there will be a minimum of 24 hours between the use of each guest room.&#160;</li><li>Guests must wear face coverings or masks while moving through or gathering in indoor common areas and maintain a six-foot distance.</li><li>Dining venues are open with reduced seating capacities to allow for a minimum of six feet between each seated group/party of guests.&#160;Self-serve, buffet-style food service will be suspended and replaced by alternative service styles.&#160;</li><li>Pool and outdoor seating shall be configured to allow for at least six feet of separation between groups of guests.</li><li>Exercise Room is limited to no more than 3 non-family/group individuals at a time. Each guest is asked to sanitize equipment before and after use.&#160;&#160;</li><li>The frequency of cleaning and sanitizing of public spaces has been increased with an emphasis on frequent contact surfaces.</li><li>Industry leading cleaning and sanitizing protocols are used to clean guest rooms with particular attention paid to high-touch items including television remote controls, toilet seats and handles, door and furniture handles, water faucet handles, nightstands, telephones, light switches, temperature control panels, alarm clocks, and luggage racks.</li><li>Housekeeping services will be limited to cleaning and advanced sanitation measures between guest stays only. No staff will enter an occupied room unless there is an emergency.</li><li>Fresh towels, additional amenities, or additional linens or pillows will be delivered to the guest door in a sealed bag upon request.&#160;</li><li>Where possible, sanitizing stations have been added to recreational areas. Both staff and guests are responsible for sanitizing borrowed equipment including bicycles, helmets, bean bags, corn-hole boards, watercrafts, life jackets, and sports equipment.&#160;&#160;</li><li>The frequency of air filter replacement and HVAC system cleaning has been increased and fresh air exchange will be maximized.<strong>&#160;</strong><strong>&#160;</strong></li></ul>\n\tLake Pointe Inn - McHenry, Maryland\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5ed95b0c1918240bbb671cd7?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Lake Pointe Inn\" height=\"799\" width=\"1066\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Booking.com</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h2><a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6776&#38;awinaffid=257137&#38;p=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.booking.com%2Fhotel%2Fus%2Flake-pointe-inn-mchenry.en-gb.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow nofollow noopener sponsored sponsored\">Book Lake Pointe Inn starting at $209 per night</a></h2><p>While many lake-fronting properties are squarely aimed at families, this adults-only B&#38;B offers a truly tranquil lakeside experience. The romantic 19th-century inn stands on the northern edge of Maryland's Deep Creek Lake, just 50 miles from Frank Lloyd Wright's Falling Water, and surrounded by beautifully landscaped gardens and rolling lawns.</p><p>Soak up water views from the rocking chairs on the deep wraparound porch, out on the stone patio, or on sun loungers on the private dock. Complimentary canoes, kayaks, and paddle boards let you explore the lake's 70 miles of shoreline.</p><p>Mission-style wood furnishings and Frank Lloyd Wright-inspired lighting complement the inn's Arts and Crafts architecture. The six rooms are individually designed in a similar Mission style and feature various layouts and amenities, from gas fireplaces to Jacuzzi tubs. Opt for the third-floor Savage Room or the second-floor Sam Leff for the best lake views from private balconies.&#160;</p><p><strong><a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g41261-d77518-Reviews-Lake_Pointe_Inn_Resort-McHenry_Garrett_County_Maryland.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Trip Advisor</a> Ranking:</strong> 1 out of 4 hotels in McHenry</p><p><strong><a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6776&#38;awinaffid=257137&#38;p=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.booking.com%2Fhotel%2Fus%2Flake-pointe-inn-mchenry.en-gb.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow nofollow noopener sponsored sponsored\">Booking.com</a> Rating:</strong> 9.5 out of 10</p><p><strong>Pros:</strong> Along with the beautiful quaint decor, the inn offers plenty of freebies including coffee, tea, snacks, a daily happy hour, and an evening pontoon boat ride. There's also a small sauna on-site.</p><p><strong>Cons:</strong> Prices can skyrocket during the peak summer and fall months.</p><p><strong>COVID-19 cleaning procedures:&#160;</strong>This hotel is currently open. It has not specifically outlined any new policies, but we will update this listing as more information becomes available.</p>\n\tThe Landing Lake Tahoe Resort & Spa - South Lake Tahoe, California\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5ed95a70f0f41906747c4b74?format=jpeg\" alt=\"The Landing Lake Tahoe Resort &#38; Spa\" height=\"800\" width=\"1067\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Booking.com</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h2><a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6776&#38;awinaffid=257137&#38;p=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.booking.com%2Fhotel%2Fus%2Fthe-landing-resort-and-spa.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow nofollow noopener sponsored sponsored\">Book The Landing Lake Tahoe Resort &#38; Spa starting at $229 per night</a></h2><p>A private beach, heated outdoor pool, and sprawling lakefront patio make this luxury boutique resort one <a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6776&#38;awinaffid=257137&#38;p=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.booking.com%2Fhotel%2Fus%2Fthe-landing-resort-and-spa.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Booking.com's top picks</a> in South Lake Tahoe. The property is walking distance to Heavenly Village, packed with shopping, dining, and entertainment options, and the Heavenly Mountain Gondola, offering panoramic views of the lake's turquoise waters and snow-capped Sierra Nevada range. If you fancy some gambling action, hop the free hotel shuttle to the Nevada-side casinos, just 10 minutes away.&#160;</p><p>Interiors take inspiration from the surrounding mountains with wood-beamed ceilings and tall stone fireplaces, but the contemporary furnishings and sleek design accents give the property a thoroughly modern feel. The on-site Jimmy's Restaurant serves excellent wood-fired California cuisine in an elegant dining room with lake views, but the restaurant's waterfront patio is the real draw, especially for the fabulous sunsets.&#160;</p><p>Rooms feature stone gas fireplaces, granite desks, marble bathrooms with heated floors, Queen- or King-sized pillow-top beds with goose-down linens, and balconies or patios. Note that entry-level rooms lack lake views: Superior King rooms measure 260 square feet but for about $10 to $20 more per night, it's worth upgrading to a far roomier corner Garden King. You'll pay a premium for rooms with lake views.</p><p><strong><a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g1798615-d5522648-Reviews-The_Landing_Resort_Spa-South_Lake_Tahoe_Lake_Tahoe_California_California.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Trip Advisor</a> Ranking:</strong> 6 out of 67 hotels in Lake Tahoe</p><p><strong><a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6776&#38;awinaffid=257137&#38;p=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.booking.com%2Fhotel%2Fus%2Fthe-landing-resort-and-spa.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow nofollow nofollow noopener sponsored sponsored sponsored\">Booking.com</a> Rating:</strong> 9 out of 10</p><p><strong>Pros:</strong> Lakefront rooms offer unbeatable views, while the private beach lets you enjoy the sun and sand without the crowds. Open year-round, the resort also has easy access to excellent skiing at Heavenly Resort.</p><p><strong>Cons:</strong> There is a $40 daily resort fee. Rooms are on the smaller side.</p><p><strong>COVID-19 cleaning procedures:&#160;</strong>This hotel is currently open and accepting reservations with the following protocols in place:&#160;</p><ul><li>All guests are asked to practice social distancing and stand six feet away from others. Signage is added to remind guests to wear masks, wash hands, and keep distance.</li><li>Seating is adjusted in all restaurants and all staff is reminded to practice social distancing.</li><li>Automatic hand sanitizer dispensers are placed in all public areas for guest and associates' use. Custom hand sanitizer dispensers are located in each guest room.</li><li>EPA-approved cleaning products effective against viruses such as COVID-19 are used, as well as electrostatic sanitizing sprayers. Housekeeping uses vacuums with whole machine filtration that traps 99.99% of particles and expels cleaner air. Extra attention is paid to all high-touch areas in common spaces and guest rooms.</li><li>All linens are washed with approved chemicals and at a high temperature in accordance with CDC guidelines.</li><li>Sanitized Rooms must be approved by management prior to being released for guest occupancy and non-essential items are removed from rooms such as magazines, extra pillows, and notepads.</li><li>Daily housekeeping will not be provided. If needed, guests must leave the room for a period of three hours to limit contact.</li><li>Pool and hot tub are open with sanitization of lounge chairs. The spa will open at a later date.</li></ul><h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-hotels-lake-tahoe\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">See more of the best hotels in Lake Tahoe</a></h3>\n\tLodge at Moosehead Lake - Greenville, Maine\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5ed95aeb988ee324d6043894?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Lodge at Moosehead Lake\" height=\"800\" width=\"1067\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Jumping Rocks</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h2><a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6776&#38;awinaffid=257137&#38;p=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.booking.com%2Fhotel%2Fus%2Flodge-at-moosehead-lake.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Book Lodge at Moosehead Lake starting at $299 per night</a></h2><p>Set on the shores of the largest lake in Maine, this upscale nine-room lodge is surrounded by mountains and thick forest, offering plenty of outdoor adventures. The property can arrange canoe or kayak rentals, fishing trips for bass and trout, or guided hiking tours. And as the name implies, there are plenty of moose to be seen, along with bald eagles, beavers, and otters.</p><p>Decorated in traditional lodge style with lots of warm wood and stone, the property features amenities such as Jacuzzis and gas fireplaces in the rooms, along with private decks with lake views. The gourmet restaurant (reserved for guests) offers fresh Maine delicacies, including lobster and locally sourced cheeses, with floor-to-ceiling windows providing panoramic vistas.</p><p>Each room has a unique theme, like the Moose Room, decorated with a hand-carved moose headboard. All have lake views and balconies except the lowest-priced Trout Room, which faces the garden.&#160;</p><p><em>Note: This hotel is seasonal and closed for the winter. It is accepting reservations for when it reopens in May 2021. This property tends to book up quickly, so it may be worth booking now for the upcoming season.</em></p><p><strong><a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g40658-d77265-Reviews-Lodge_at_Moosehead_Lake-Greenville_Maine.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Trip Advisor</a> Ranking:</strong> 2 out of 5 hotels in Greenville</p><p><strong><a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6776&#38;awinaffid=257137&#38;p=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.booking.com%2Fhotel%2Fus%2Flodge-at-moosehead-lake.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Booking.com</a> Rating:</strong> 9.5 out of 10</p><p><strong>Pros:</strong> Breakfast is included in the rate and features a different menu every day. There are also complimentary snacks available around the clock.</p><p><strong>Cons:</strong> Rates soar during summer and prime fall leaf-peeping. The lodge is open seasonally, May through October.</p><p><strong>COVID-19 cleaning procedures:&#160;</strong>This hotel is currently open and accepting reservations with the following procedures in place:&#160;</p><ul><li>Residents of Vermont, New Hampshire, Connecticut, New York, New Jersey, and Maine are not subject to restrictions. Residents of all other states will not be required to quarantine after simply signing a brief \"<a href=\"https://www.maine.gov/decd/sites/maine.gov.decd/files/inline-files/KeepMaineHealthy_GuestComplianceCertificate.pdf\">Certificate of Compliance</a>\" required by Governor Janet Mills.&#160;&#160;</li><li>The Lodge will be offering self check-in and check-out and hand sanitizers are provided at the entrance.</li><li>Meal service options are adjusted to allow for take-out, outdoor dining, and modified hours.</li><li>Hotel staff provide luggage cleaning upon arrival, routine sanitizing of all frequently touched surfaces, and increased cleaning of restrooms and public areas.</li><li>Housekeeping and room service is available upon request and not done while a guest is in the room.</li><li>Reservations can be canceled or changed during the 2020 season with no penalty.&#160;</li></ul>\n\tMore ideas for safe vacations during COVID-19\n\t\n\t<ul><li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/is-travel-safe-coronavirus\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"80\">Is travel safe? Day 2020</a>, we expect to see exceptional pricing on upright, cordless, and robot vacuums in both new and refurbished conditions. Last year, we found deals on vacuums from popular brands like <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/stores/Dyson+Co./page/6E6D08F3-8F26-4243-B63A-6E50F0E65725?ref_=ast_bln&tag=biip_101320_amazon-prime-day-2020-200-20\">Dyson</a>, <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/stores/iRobot/page/A144A34F-3D29-45A4-9DF7-8E77C31F8C7F?ref_=ast_bln&tag=biip_101320_amazon-prime-day-2020-200-20\">iRobot</a>, <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/stores/eufy/page/B02CB877-324C-4130-B1A3-41E418F2C467?ref_=ast_bln&tag=biip_101320_amazon-prime-day-2020-200-20\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Eufy</a>, and <a href=\"https://amzn.to/2JsdceX\">Bissell</a>.&#160;&#160;</p><p>If you've been holding out for a deal on a vacuum, mark October 13 and 14 on your calendar. Dozens of vacuums will likely see their lowest prices ever.&#160;</p><p>If you're not an Amazon Prime member already, we recommend signing up for a <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/amazonprime\">free 30-day trial</a> sometime before the event to get free access to all the deals.</p><div id=\"ProductCard_5e28784d24306a101e35ab35\" style=\"position:relative; top:0; left: 0\"></iframe></div><h2>When is Prime Day?</h2><p>Prime Day takes place over October 13 and 14 this year. The Amazon Prime member-exclusive event is a great chance to find vacuums from major players like Dyson and iRobot for all-time low prices.&#160;&#160;</p><p>Not only will we likely see a variety of solid household appliance deals from Amazon during this time, but concurrent sales like <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/walmart-prime-day-sale-deals\">Walmart's Big Save Event</a> from October 11-15 and <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/target-deal-days-prime-day-sale\">Target's Deal Days</a> over October 13-14 are also likely to surface great vacuum discounts — though stock tends to go fast.</p><h2>What vacuum deals do we expect to see?</h2><p>We can only speculate what deals we'll see during Amazon Prime Day 2020, but over last year's event, we found deals on popular brands like <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/stores/Dyson+Co./page/6E6D08F3-8F26-4243-B63A-6E50F0E65725?ref_=ast_bln&tag=biip_101320_amazon-prime-day-2020-200-20\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Dyson</a>, <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/stores/iRobot/page/A144A34F-3D29-45A4-9DF7-8E77C31F8C7F?ref_=ast_bln&tag=biip_101320_amazon-prime-day-2020-200-20\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored\">iRobot</a>, <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/stores/eufy/page/B02CB877-324C-4130-B1A3-41E418F2C467?ref_=ast_bln\">Eufy</a>, and <a href=\"https://amzn.to/2JsdceX\" rel=\"nofollow sponsored\">Bissell</a>. <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/vacuum-sale-amazon-prime-day-2018-7\">Last year,</a> Prime members saved on two high-performing Dyson cordless vacs: $70 off the <a href=\"https://amzn.to/2JqQO5A\">Dyson V7</a> and $135 off the <a href=\"https://aax-us-east.amazon-adsystem.com/x/c/Qg3fHjIlOhApiLP9NIupViYAAAFr3WtgzAEAAAFKAZ-ks_U/https://www.amazon.com/Logitech-Orion-Mechanical-Gaming-Keyboard/dp/B01IENFJ14/ref=as_li_ss_tl?creativeASIN=B01IENFJ14&imprToken=BMbbJvERdd8oaFHTUY.kng&slotNum=2&s=electronics&ie=UTF8&qid=1531625276&sr=1-1&keywords=Logitech+Gaming+Keyboard+G910&linkCode=w61&tag=biip_071618_amazon-prime-day-20&linkId=cae83c72515d3df6b222d3b0867cc92d;linkId=cae83c72515d3df6b222d3b0867cc92d\">Dyson V8</a>.</p><p>You can expect to see discounts on cordless, upright, and robot vacuums from these brands and more this Prime Day. Though the type of vacuum you need depends on the specifics of your living situation, you're sure to have a wide range to choose from.&#160;</p><p>Meanwhile, robot vacuum competitor Ecovacs held its own against favorites iRobot and Eufy with $120 off its <a href=\"https://amzn.to/2LNojAK\">Deebot N79S</a>, a smart assistant-compatible vacuum with three cleaning modes and a 110-minute run time.</p><h2>How to shop for a vacuum</h2><p>Vacuum shopping can be confusing, especially with all of the hype around cordless and robot models. Ultimately, the best vacuum for you is based on a few factors, like your home size, flooring type, cleaning frequency, and pets.&#160;</p><p>For a full lineup of the best models available now, our guide to <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-vacuum\">the best vacuum cleaners</a> is a great place to start — from there you can determine what type of vacuum will suit your needs best. We also have guides to the best <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-robot-vacuum\">robot vacuums</a>, <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-cordless-vacuum-cleaner#the-best-cordless-vacuum-overall-1\">cordless vacuums</a>, and <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-cheap-vacuum-cleaner\">budget vacuum cleaners</a>, to help you narrow down your search even more.</p><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article (Connie Chen,Sarah Saril)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/5f7f7d384c3b2e0019bba033?format=jpeg":null,"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":null,"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=2qlViupelIQ:2UTWErSnZRc:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx11/cdn70@2020_1/2020/10/09/03-33-25-872_a41d5c25cc2582de.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=2qlViupelIQ:2UTWErSnZRc:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx11/cdn86@2020_2/2020/10/09/03-33-26-893_b59875c688758683.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn41@2020_4/2020/10/09/03-33-30-246_740defb435ea442b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=2qlViupelIQ:2UTWErSnZRc:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx8/cdn81@2020_3/2020/10/09/03-33-25-144_92ab9154bdeee815.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/2qlViupelIQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx25/cdn66@2020_2/2020/10/09/03-33-26-747_fcdeae2df3d2c5d7.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1602214360909},{"createdTime":"2020-10-09 11:32:40","updatedTime":"2020-10-09 11:32:40","title":"Bombas makes the best socks we've ever worn — the brand has also donated over 41 million pairs to homeless shelters to date","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/bombas-socks-review","description":"<p class=\"financial-disclaimer\"><i>When you buy through our links, we may earn money from our affiliate partners. <a href=\"https://www.insider-inc.com/commerce-on-insider-inc/\">Learn more.</a></i></p><p><a href=\"http://www.pntra.com/t/TUJGRkVJTEJGSEhLR01CRklHSk5I?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbombas.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\"><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5e4ef4ff04389538216a9102?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Bombas 2\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Bombas</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></a></p><ul class=\"summary-list\"><li>Cult-favorite startup <a href=\"http://www.pntra.com/t/TUJGRkVJTEJGSEhLR01CRklHSk5I?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbombas.com%2F&sid=1582656569836a43ifdg38dg38\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow nofollow noopener sponsored sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Bombas</a> was founded to address the fact that socks are the #1 most requested donation item in homeless shelters.</li><li>The company's socks are the end result of two <a href=\"http://www.pjtra.com/t/TUJGRkVJTEJGSEhLR01CRklHSk5I?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbombas.com%2Fpages%2Fsock-tech\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow nofollow noopener sponsored sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">years of research and development</a> and solve common annoyances.</li><li>Every time you buy a pair, the company donates a pair of Bombas socks to someone in need. To date, Bombas has given away <a href=\"http://www.pntrs.com/t/TUJGRkVJTEJGSEhLR01CRklHSk5I?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbombas.com%2Fpages%2Fgiving-back\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow nofollow noopener sponsored sponsored nofollow sponsored\">over 41 million pairs of socks</a>.</li><li>The Insider Reviews team has tested the brand's <a href=\"https://www.pntra.com/t/TUJGRkVJTEJGSEhLR01CRklHSk5I?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbombas.com%2Fcollections%2Fwomens-casual-socks\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow nofollow noopener sponsored sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">casual socks</a>, <a href=\"https://www.pjatr.com/t/TUJGRkVJTEJGSEhLR01CRklHSk5I?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbombas.com%2Fcollections%2Fwomens-performance-socks\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow nofollow noopener sponsored sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">athletic socks</a>, and <a href=\"https://www.pntrac.com/t/TUJGRkVJTEJGSEhLR01CRklHSk5I?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbombas.com%2Fcollections%2Fwomens-dress-socks-1\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow nofollow noopener sponsored sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">dress socks</a> over the years — and we think they're the best socks you can buy.</li></ul><div id=\"ProductCard_5e5599d5fee23d67e620b8c2\" style=\"position:relative; display:block; width: 100%\"><iframe src=\"https://produktor.businessinsider.com/productCardService?id=5e5599d5fee23d67e620b8c2&type=small&live=true\" width=\"100%\" height=\"150%\" frameborder=\"0\" allowfullscreen=\"\" style=\"position:absolute; top:0; left: 0\"></iframe></div><p>Before <a href=\"https://www.pntra.com/t/TUJGRkVJTEJGSEhLR01CRklHSk5I?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbombas.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Bombas</a>' socks became a cult-favorite of the direct-to-consumer (D2C) boom and a gift as safe and universally pleasing <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/candle-gifts-guide-jo-malone-diptyque-le-labo-voluspa-lafco-otherland-2018-11\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">as candles</a>, it was a company created primarily around a social mission.</p><p>When founders David Heath and Randy Goldberg realized homeless shelters were struggling to meet the demand for clean, longlasting socks, they started researching the market — and realized there was an opportunity to create an option in-between cheap multi-packs and niche, high-end technical pairs.&#160;</p><p>So the two founded <a href=\"https://www.pntra.com/t/TUJGRkVJTEJGSEhLR01CRklHSk5I?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbombas.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Bombas</a> in 2013, and they set out to create one perfect, no-fuss iteration of the everyday sock. Heath and Goldberg approached the basic building block of a wardrobe as shoppers first, asking what they hated about their own typical pairs and marshaling atypical resources to engineer the shortcuts and solutions. Two years of detailed research and development — and one <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/shark-tank-bombas-didnt-take-investor-insults-personally-2018-8\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">fateful episode of Shark Tank later</a> — and Bombas sent a genuinely exciting update to the lowly sock out into the mainstream.</p><p><strong><a href=\"https://www.pntra.com/t/TUJGRkVJTEJGSEhLR01CRklHSk5I?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbombas.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Bombas socks</a> are \"other\" in the best way possible.</strong> <a href=\"http://www.pjtra.com/t/TUJGRkVJTEJGSEhLR01CRklHSk5I?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbombas.com%2Fpages%2Fsock-tech\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Ankle socks</a> have blister tabs, <a href=\"http://www.gopjn.com/t/TUJGRkVJTEJGSEhLR01CRklHSk5I?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbombas.com%2Fsearch%3Fq%3Dcalf%2Bsocks\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">calf socks</a> have thoughtfully placed tension, or \"stay-up technology,\" and <a href=\"http://www.gopjn.com/t/TUJGRkVJTEJGSEhLR01CRklHSk5I?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbombas.com%2Fsearch%3Fq%3Dno-show\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">no-shows</a> use a combination of heel grips and contoured seaming to stay put. The Y-stitched heel cups the back of your foot without creating bulk, and the toe seam is linked by hand — which gets rid of the annoying bump at the end of your toes in cheap pairs. The footbed is reinforced for a little extra cushion and longevity, and, in an effort to add arch support, the socks mirror the strong natural structure of a honeycomb across the mid-foot.&#160;</p><p><a href=\"http://www.pntrs.com/t/TUJGRkVJTEJGSEhLR01CRklHSk5I?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbombas.com%2Fpages%2Fgiving-back\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\"><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5e4ef3fd2c24b6387e79b1de?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Bombas\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Bombas</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></a></p><p>The company also prioritizes quality materials, which is especially obvious in its collection of moisture-wicking and temperature-regulating <a href=\"https://www.gopjn.com/t/TUJGRkVJTEJGSEhLR01CRklHSk5I?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbombas.com%2Fcollections%2Fwomens-merino\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">merino wool</a>.&#160;</p><p><strong>And for every pair of socks you purchase, Bombas donates another pair to someone in need.</strong> To date, the company is responsible for gifting <a href=\"http://www.pntrs.com/t/TUJGRkVJTEJGSEhLR01CRklHSk5I?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbombas.com%2Fpages%2Fgiving-back\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">over 41 million pairs of socks</a>, all of which are specially designed to meet the needs of the homeless.</p><p>\"We put as much thought and care into the production of the donation sock as [the originals].\" Goldberg told Business Insider. \"In working with giving partners to engineer a sock that would specifically meet the needs of the homeless, we designed the sock to be darker to avoid less visible wear and tear, added an anti-microbial treatment to prevent the growth of odor and fungus since these socks are not washed as frequently, and added reinforced seams for great durability, ensuring a longer lifespan.\"&#160;</p><p>Bombas is also a certified B-Corp, meaning it has volunteered to be graded by the nonprofit B Lab each year to ensure they're meeting the highest standards of social and environmental performance, public transparency, and legal accountability. You can find other <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/b-corp-retail-companies\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">B-Corps we love to shop at here</a>.&#160;&#160;</p><p>Though a pair of <a href=\"https://www.pntra.com/t/TUJGRkVJTEJGSEhLR01CRklHSk5I?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbombas.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Bombas socks</a> will set you back further than a standard multi-pack at Target will (ankle socks <a href=\"http://www.pntra.com/t/TUJGRkVJTEJGSEhLR01CRklHSk5I?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbombas.com%2Fsearch%3Fq%3Dankle%2Bsocks\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow nofollow nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">start at $12</a>), they'll last you longer, feel better on your feet, and benefit another person in need with a similarly upgraded essential. Business Insider's Reviews team has tested the brand's <a href=\"https://www.pntra.com/t/TUJGRkVJTEJGSEhLR01CRklHSk5I?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbombas.com%2Fcollections%2Fwomens-casual-socks\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">casual socks</a>, <a href=\"https://www.pjatr.com/t/TUJGRkVJTEJGSEhLR01CRklHSk5I?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbombas.com%2Fcollections%2Fwomens-performance-socks\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">athletic socks</a>, and <a href=\"https://www.pntrac.com/t/TUJGRkVJTEJGSEhLR01CRklHSk5I?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbombas.com%2Fcollections%2Fwomens-dress-socks-1\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">dress socks</a> over the years, and we've been impressed by the comfort, longevity, and functionality every time. We think they're worth the investment if you can spare the extra money. They also make especially great gifts.&#160;</p><p>Plus, the company occasionally offers 20% off your first order. Right now, you can save 20% as a first-time customer when you join its mailing list.&#160;You can also save up to 5% by <a href=\"https://www.pntrac.com/t/TUJGRkVJTEJGSEhLR01CRklHSk5I?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbombas.com%2Fsearch%3Fq%3Dpack\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">buying a pack</a>.</p><p>And, if you don't love your pair of Bombas, the company still has the sort of bulletproof customer guarantee that has grown increasingly rare. Bombas upholds a \"no matter what, no questions asked, no holds barred, no ifs, no ands, no buts\" happiness guarantee. \"If you have a problem, we will solve it. Refund it. Send you new socks. Whatever it takes.\"</p><p>You can&#160;<a href=\"https://www.pntra.com/t/TUJGRkVJTEJGSEhLR01CRklHSk5I?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbombas.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">shop Bombas socks</a> by material, height (No Show, Ankle, Quarter, Calf, Knee-High), or activity (Casual, Athletic, Dress). There's also the option to narrow athletic socks down <a href=\"https://www.pntrac.com/t/TUJGRkVJTEJGSEhLR01CRklHSk5I?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbombas.com%2Fcollections%2Fwomens-performance-socks\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">by sport</a>: running, cycling, ski, hiking, tennis, golf, grippers, and basketball.</p><p>Bombas has expanded in recent years into basics like <a href=\"https://www.pntrs.com/t/TUJGRkVJTEJGSEhLR01CRklHSk5I?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbombas.com%2Fproducts%2Fwomens-cotton-sweatpants%3Fvariant%3Dgrey-heather\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">sweatpants ($78)</a> and <a href=\"https://www.pjtra.com/t/TUJGRkVJTEJGSEhLR01CRklHSk5I?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbombas.com%2Fcollections%2Fwomens-t-shirts\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">t-shirts (from $36)</a>, but socks remain at the company's core.&#160;</p><h2>The bottom line</h2><p>You can find a full range of <a href=\"https://www.pntra.com/t/TUJGRkVJTEJGSEhLR01CRklHSk5I?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbombas.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Bombas</a> socks from knee highs to dress socks in classic colors and adventurous colorways for men, women, and kids — each with the thoughtful attention to detail and comfort that have solidified their success as a D2C leader.&#160;</p><p>If you're looking for an instant upgrade to everyday life and can afford to spend a little more on a few pairs of socks, we highly recommend investing in Bombas.</p><p>Plus, it doesn't hurt that the company serves as a successful example of <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/b-corp-retail-companies\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">business with positive impact</a>; you get the best socks you've ever worn for a price that won't break the bank, and your purchase helps improve the lives of someone else at the most basic and necessary level.</p><h3><a href=\"https://www.pntra.com/t/TUJGRkVJTEJGSEhLR01CRklHSk5I?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbombas.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Shop Bombas socks here</a>.</h3><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a href='https://www.businessinsider.com/bombas-socks-review'>Business This specific set is programmed to turn on when the sun sets and off when the sun rises.</p>\n</div><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=APlKiQxjW94:ntrOX67BlzA:yIl2AUoC8zA\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA\" border=\"0\"></img></a> <a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=APlKiQxjW94:ntrOX67BlzA:F7zBnMyn0Lo\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=APlKiQxjW94:ntrOX67BlzA:F7zBnMyn0Lo\" href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=APlKiQxjW94:ntrOX67BlzA:qj6IDK7rITs\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs\" border=\"0\"></img></a> <a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=APlKiQxjW94:ntrOX67BlzA:gIN9vFwOqvQ\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=APlKiQxjW94:ntrOX67BlzA:gIN9vFwOqvQ\" border=\"0\"></img></a>\n</div><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/APlKiQxjW94\" height=\"1\" width=\"1\" alt=\"\"/>","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Thu, 08 Oct 2020 21:51:00 +0000","feedId":22,"bgimg":"https://i.insider.com/5dcb12307eece50e63184c99?format=jpeg","linkMd5":"2c8b61c4d8e55b51afbee6846742497a","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx24/cdn11@2020_3/2020/10/09/03-33-10-221_ab997e3a0215a81f.webp","destWidth":1332,"destHeight":999,"sourceBytes":40130,"destBytes":40130,"author":"insider@insider.com Leighton)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/5dcb14963afd370e37776a92?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx16/cdn95@2020_2/2020/10/09/03-33-32-722_9cadd2297f388bf9.webp","https://i.insider.com/5dfb9af5855cc2481c012856?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx16/cdn81@2020_4/2020/10/09/03-33-32-091_4bdd2f197017f16c.webp","https://i.insider.com/5c06e255985cfd6cc53cd0be?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn44@2020_6/2020/10/09/03-33-33-891_775af75f95e96a02.webp","https://i.insider.com/5d5db25d23f19c09df7b4923?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx29/cdn55@2020_5/2020/10/09/03-33-27-574_d1085e9d43bb7417.webp","https://i.insider.com/5d5dab4823f19c07717dd884?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx4/cdn86@2020_5/2020/10/09/03-33-24-444_d5fc97380da68f4e.webp","https://i.insider.com/5d5da9ddcd978406de382644?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx16/cdn1@2020_2/2020/10/09/03-33-27-912_d8eef0c521e5f7fc.webp","https://i.insider.com/5b16f08a1ae66236008b513f?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx31/cdn29@2020_4/2020/10/09/03-33-30-376_37b88ab868bda23a.webp","https://i.insider.com/5d5ea400cd97841f16589bd7?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx25/cdn26@2020_3/2020/10/09/03-33-30-369_04c16806822afb96.webp","https://i.insider.com/5dcb091c3afd3776ae62691d?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx18/cdn5@2020_2/2020/10/09/03-33-30-128_6948f363cc027e5d.webp","https://i.insider.com/5c0edb277d51f102ca4daf84?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx15/cdn71@2020_5/2020/10/09/03-33-31-233_1abc31a82c72b361.webp","https://i.insider.com/5d5da62a46552c062308cf3c?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx7/cdn77@2020_2/2020/10/09/03-33-24-995_c700db1e0bde017f.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f7f5e38d5f23d00195951a4?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx8/cdn75@2020_4/2020/10/09/03-33-30-572_8cda7def219e0ea4.webp","https://i.insider.com/5de82c7 5dac61ad2b4707b73506f4?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx10/cdn35@2020_2/2020/10/09/03-33-28-907_713945700243a4da.webp","https://i.insider.com/5d5dae7346552c08d44244e3?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx25/cdn16@2020_5/2020/10/09/03-33-35-176_f0695a2826ab6c96.webp","https://i.insider.com/5d5db02aadbcf8082e5ef03b?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx7/cdn47@2020_6/2020/10/09/03-33-34-535_7b116a67e4303456.webp","https://i.insider.com/5d5db0fead2b470902181742?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx30/cdn80@2020_3/2020/10/09/03-33-31-209_e476f71f872824a3.webp","https://i.insider.com/5d5db185bbb7c60bdc4e07c4?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx29/cdn45@2020_3/2020/10/09/03-33-32-473_6ac19553ab031283.webp","https://i.insider.com/5d5db1c5ad2b47093c464bb3?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx32/cdn89@2020_4/2020/10/09/03-33-34-283_e12354c94d294159.webp","https://i.insider.com/5bce38ded2e64826f5242249?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx11/cdn22@2020_2/2020/10/09/03-33-34-364_754752caa9cfbaa7.webp","https://i.insider.com/5d5db3f300ef2b0b2662c3a4?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx22/cdn58@2020_3/2020/10/09/03-33-33-363_11328ba01ab9da04.webp","https://i.insider.com/5d5db2ecbbb7c60c3b17ae53?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx22/cdn28@2020_6/2020/10/09/03-33-31-695_fdb3b887784c2fe1.webp","https://i.insider.com/5d5e9f5b91b6f62049170c26?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx29/cdn15@2020_5/2020/10/09/03-33-30-923_29b07076efccfeb9.webp","https://i.insider.com/5d5e9fd254c75f1c3908163c?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx/cdn83@2020_6/2020/10/09/03-33-32-738_9afaed2419361d42.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f7f4525282c500018c7966e?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx21/cdn90@2020_1/2020/10/09/03-33-31-970_f95fb68e350a6069.webp","https://i.insider.com/5d5ea2db54c75f1d882006d3?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx30/cdn32@2020_4/2020/10/09/03-33-28-913_f753fcdb56513184.webp","https://i.insider.com/5dcb13c73afd370c3c0b7146?format=jpeg":null,"https://i.insider.com/5c06bee3e60d4f6e0257ec2f?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx31/cdn5@2020_3/2020/10/09/03-33-34-369_e9da48154dad3bc5.webp","https://i.insider.com/5dcb0eca7eece506e20fd8c8?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx3/cdn47@2020_6/2020/10/09/03-33-31-223_8950d882b362edab.webp","https://i.insider.com/5d5ea5022e22af1c3666c464?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx24/cdn31@2020_4/2020/10/09/03-33-27-194_b9680f54d81b9170.webp","https://i.insider.com/5d5ea57454c75f1e47297bac?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx4/cdn84@2020_5/2020/10/09/03-33-29-951_ede3341e414bfe1c.webp","https://i.insider.com/5d696e142e22af35ca684e64?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx24/cdn71@2020_4/2020/10/09/03-33-34-873_44109641b3baea54.webp","https://i.insider.com/5d5ea820adbcf81f935e0de7?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx18/cdn49@2020_4/2020/10/09/03-33-32-398_380f0ad9f11d32b5.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f7f49ca282c500018c79688?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx1/cdn79@2020_2/2020/10/09/03-33-29-107_5c544adc3fa6c6dc.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":null,"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=APlKiQxjW94:ntrOX67BlzA:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx11/cdn30@2020_6/2020/10/09/03-33-29-449_2eb61fb4d70ad17c.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=APlKiQxjW94:ntrOX67BlzA:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx25/cdn30@2020_2/2020/10/09/03-33-24-702_eb404234b58aed86.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn41@2020_4/2020/10/09/03-33-30-246_740defb435ea442b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=APlKiQxjW94:ntrOX67BlzA:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx4/cdn50@2020_2/2020/10/09/03-33-28-185_fb0f7823b2d2060d.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/APlKiQxjW94":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx33/cdn99@2020_5/2020/10/09/03-33-35-498_07b082f12f51ecfa.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1602214360890},{"createdTime":"2020-10-09 11:32:40","updatedTime":"2020-10-09 11:32:40","title":"How to stop spam text messages in several different ways on your iPhone or Android device","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-stop-spam-text-messages","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f7e2850282c500018c7939f?format=jpeg\" alt=\"senior man holding phone at home looking serious\" height=\"1249\" width=\"2500\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>There are a few different ways to reduce the amount of spam texts you receive.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Roberto Westbrook/Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>You can minimize and take steps to stop the spam text messages you receive on your cellular device in a number of ways.</li>\n<li>Don't ever engage with spammers, even to text a STOP request; instead, you can report them to your phone carrier or use tools on your phone to filter or block them.</li>\n<li>If necessary, you can buy an app that can help block spam texts as well, though it will only be effective while you pay for a subscription to it.&#160;</li>\n<li><strong><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/tech-reference\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-module=\"summary_bullets\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"0\">Visit Business Insider's Tech Reference library for more stories</a>.</strong></li>\n</ul><p>Unwanted text messages, while generally not as annoying as telemarketing calls, can be very irritating.&#160;</p><p>Not only do <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/category/spam\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">spam</a> texts clutter your messaging app's inbox and distract you with nonsense notifications, but if you don't have unlimited texting with your cellular plan, you might be paying for junk. And some spam messages contain links to potentially dangerous <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/category/malware\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">malware</a>.</p><p>It pays to try to stop – or at least minimize – spam texts when possible.</p><h2><strong>How to stop spam texts</strong></h2><p>Here are five steps you can take to filter or block spammers from reaching your messaging app's inbox.</p><h3><strong>Don't respond to unwanted messages</strong></h3><p>You're probably familiar with the way legitimate sources let you opt out of future text communication by replying \"STOP.\" Many spammers offer you the option to respond with STOP as well, but don't. Spammers use your reply – any reply, including STOP – as a signal that you received your message and are actively engaged in your messages, so that can embolden them to send you more messages. Your information can also be sold to other spammers who are looking for \"verified active\" phone numbers.&#160;</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f7e24d1282c500018c79382?format=jpeg\" alt=\"How_to_stop_spam_texts 2\" height=\"1137\" width=\"1242\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Don&#39;t text &#34;STOP&#34; unless you trust the sender is trustworthy and legitimate.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Dave Johnson/Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><h3><strong>Report spammers to your cellular provider</strong></h3><p>One way to counter spam texts is by reporting unwanted texters directly to your phone service provider. For most major carriers — including AT&#38;T, T-Mobile, and Verizon — you can copy the offending message and text it to 7726. You should receive a reply, which, depending on the carrier,&#160; might include a request to send the phone number that the spam came from. This probably won't result in instant results for you, but it will contribute to cleaning up the texting ecosystem for everyone.&#160;</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f7e254b282c500018c79385?format=jpeg\" alt=\"spam texts\" height=\"1478\" width=\"1242\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>You can report potential spam to your phone carrier.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Dave Johnson/Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><h3><strong>Filter potential spammers</strong></h3><p>Most phones have a setting to automatically filter potential spam messages so that they don't appear in the same list with important, legitimate texts from known contacts.&#160;</p><ul><li>On an iPhone, start the Settings app and tap \"Messages.\" Scroll down and turn on \"Filter Unknown Senders\" by swiping the button to the right.&#160;</li><li>On Android, start the Messaging app and tap the three dots at the top right. In the dropdown menu, choose \"Settings,\" and then tap \"Spam Protection.\" Finally, turn on \"Enable spam protection\" by swiping the button to the right.&#160;</li></ul><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f7e25adc655f6001969ecb4?format=jpeg\" alt=\"How_to_stop_spam_texts 3\" height=\"800\" width=\"1365\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>You can filter potential spammers on both iOS and Android.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Dave Johnson/Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><h3><strong>Block specific spammers</strong></h3><p>If you get frequent spam from the same phone number, you can use your messaging app to block that number. Don't count on this helping in every situation, though, because most spammers can appear to use a different number each time they reach out to you, so blocking individual numbers may have little effect.&#160;</p><ul><li>On an iPhone, open the message and tap the user icon at the top of the page, then tap \"info.\" On the next page tap \"info\" again, and then tap \"Block this Caller.\"</li></ul><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f7e2613c655f6001969ecb6?format=jpeg\" alt=\"How_to_stop_spam_texts 4\" height=\"1919\" width=\"1242\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>You can block specific phone numbers, which is handy if you repeatedly get texts from the same sender.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Dave Johnson/Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul><li>On Android, the process may vary depending on the messaging app you're using, but in general, you can tap the three dots at the top of the message and choose \"Block number\" from the dropdown menu.&#160;</li></ul><h3><strong>Use a paid text-blocking app</strong></h3><p>Hopefully, some combination of the previous tips dramatically reduces the number of spam messages you receive. If you need additional assistance, though, you can turn to an app designed to block spam. An app like <a href=\"https://www.robokiller.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">RoboKiller</a>, available for both iPhone and Android, can dramatically reduce the spam you receive, both in the form of phone calls and text messages. These apps aren't free, though. RoboKiller has a 7-day free trial, and then costs either $5 per month or $40 per year.</p><div id=\"ProductCard_5d8e19fb2e22af18f40d281d\" style=\"position:relative; display:block; width: 100%\"><iframe src=\"https://produktor.businessinsider.com/productCardService?id=5d8e19fb2e22af18f40d281d&type=small&live=true\" width=\"100%\" height=\"150%\" frameborder=\"0\" allowfullscreen=\"\" style=\"position:absolute; top:0; left: 0\"></iframe></div><div id=\"ProductCard_5e6a7c1f84159f1b1c0bcad4\" style=\"position:relative; display:block; width: 100%\"><iframe src=\"https://produktor.businessinsider.com/productCardService?id=5e6a7c1f84159f1b1c0bcad4&type=small&live=true\" width=\"100%\" height=\"150%\" frameborder=\"0\" allowfullscreen=\"\" style=\"position:absolute; top:0; left: 0\"></iframe></div><h2><strong>Related coverage from&#160;<a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/tech-reference\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"100\">Tech Reference</a>:</strong></h2><ul><li><h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-stop-robocalls-spam-calls-on-android-phone\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"100\">How to stop robocalls and other spam calls from reaching your Android phone<br></a></h3></li><li><h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-stop-emails-going-to-spam-in-gmail\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"100\">How to stop emails from going into your spam folder in Gmail in 2 different ways</a></h3></li><li><h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-mark-email-as-spam-on-iphone\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" iPhone</a></h3></li><li><h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-block-a-number-on-android\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"100\">How to block a number on any Android phone to stop receiving unwanted calls</a></h3></li></ul><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a
