2020 19:54:49 +0000","feedId":22,"bgimg":"https://i.insider.com/5f7f5796e4029f001876056d?format=jpeg","linkMd5":"ecaf4c53ebce9c900acc56e654947581","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn4@2020_4/2020/10/09/03-32-41-526_c70d504cffbd3137.webp","destWidth":1774,"destHeight":1331,"sourceBytes":141622,"destBytes":141622,"author":"insider@insider.com (Katie Canales)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/5f7f5796e4029f001876056d?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn4@2020_4/2020/10/09/03-32-41-526_c70d504cffbd3137.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":null,"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=gvDRCH03Ts4:1OdVJsVenG0:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx19/cdn22@2020_4/2020/10/09/03-33-24-742_dfa81e62cc8e8a01.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=gvDRCH03Ts4:1OdVJsVenG0:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx15/cdn29@2020_3/2020/10/09/03-33-34-421_934ae5d082c6bc73.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn41@2020_4/2020/10/09/03-33-30-246_740defb435ea442b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=gvDRCH03Ts4:1OdVJsVenG0:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx16/cdn53@2020_5/2020/10/09/03-33-24-952_38f822c601a8611d.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/gvDRCH03Ts4":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx29/cdn23@2020_2/2020/10/09/03-33-25-638_9912e92b22be7c3c.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1602214360894},{"createdTime":"2020-10-09 11:32:40","updatedTime":"2020-10-09 11:32:40","title":"Singapore forges ahead despite the impact of the pandemic by focusing on rebuilding and reinventing","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-singapore-forges-ahead-during-a-pandemic-2020-10","description":"<div class=\"content-header\"><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f3d933742f43f001ddfdeac?format=jpeg\" alt=\"resilient singapore banner\" height=\"209\" width=\"1667\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></div><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f7f53d9282c500018c796c5?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Daily Life In Singapore Amid The Coronavirus Pandemic\" height=\"683\" width=\"910\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Singapore started to further ease the coronavirus restrictions by allowing social gatherings up to five people, re-opening of retail outlets and dining in at food and beverage outlets, subjected to safe distancing.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Suhaimi Abdullah/Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>After a phased re-opening, Singapore is cautiously returning to the \"new normal,\" but the impact of the pandemic is still being felt throughout the economy.</li>\n<li>The pandemic has reiterated the need for businesses and individuals to be digitally ready.&#160;</li>\n<li>This article is part of a series called&#160;<a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/category/resilient-singapore\" data-analytics-module=\"summary_bullets\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"0\">Resilient Singapore</a>, which focuses on Singapore's resilient and sustainable growth in the post-pandemic world.</li>\n</ul><p>The annual Singapore Food Festival, a array of local culinary experiences and events, is usually a pitstop for foodies in the city-state. But its 27th edition this year was markedly different as it moved entirely online, with virtual masterclasses and ingredient kits sent to the homes of participants instead.&#160;</p><p>After a three-month \"circuit-breaker\" from April to June — a soft lockdown imposed by the Singaporean government — the country is still in phase two of its re-opening, where most retail, food and beverage, and sports facilities can operate. However, large-scale gatherings and entertainment venues, like the annual food festival, did not receive the green light, requiring organizers to quickly adapt to a new reality.</p><h2><strong>An uncertain global and local outlook weigh on the labor market</strong></h2><p>While the circuit breaker did its job to control community spread, it led to a sharp contraction of the Singaporean economy by 13.2% on a year-on-year basis in the second quarter. The economic situation was worsened by a weak external demand amidst a global economic downturn.</p><p>The virtual food festival was just one of the many initiatives by Singapore's tourism authorities to revive a sluggish lifestyle and tourism sector, which has been badly hit by the pandemic.&#160;</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f7dd68f94fce90018f7b9db?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Resilient Singapore GDP Graphic\" height=\"681\" width=\"827\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Economic Survey of Singapore, Second Quarter 2020\n<p class=\"copyright\"><a href=\"https://www.mti.gov.sg/-/media/MTI/Resources/Economic-Survey-of-Singapore/2020/Economic-Survey-of-Singapore-Second-Quarter-2020/FullReport_2Q20.pdf\" target=\"_blank\">Singapore Ministry of Trade and Industry</a></p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p>Among the worst-performing sectors are construction, transportation, accommodation, and food and beverage. Some firms have had to hand out pay cuts, while others were left with no choice but to let workers go. All this contributed to Singapore's overall unemployment rate of 2.9%, the highest in more than a decade.</p><p>Government support for affected industries and individuals has been swift with <a href=\"https://www.gov.sg/article/more-support-for-workers-and-jobs-through-the-jobs-support-scheme-and-covid-19-support-grant\">close to SG$100 billion</a> dedicated in a bid to equally protect vulnerable jobs and workers, as well as boost growth in high-performing sectors. Officials assess that the budgets are estimated to<a href=\"https://www.mti.gov.sg/-/media/MTI/Resources/Economic-Survey-of-Singapore/2020/Economic-Survey-of-Singapore-Second-Quarter-2020/FA_2Q20.pdf\"> avert a loss in real GDP of about 5.5% in 2020</a> and reduce the rise in the resident unemployment rate by 1.7 percentage points.</p><p>Even with generous government support, experts warned that businesses must also do their part to stay resilient. They should thoroughly assess their own \"developmental potential, taking into account the industry and sector that they are in, and whether the business itself has strong fundamentals,\" <a href=\"https://www.straitstimes.com/business/many-small-medium-enterprises-here-still-struggling-to-survive\">Mr Kurt Wee</a>, president of the Association of Small and Medium Enterprises, said. \"Once this has been established, businesses can then consider how they can diversify and grow their revenue streams amid COVID-19.\"</p><h2><strong>Future-proofing Singapore's businesses</strong></h2><p>Shifts in consumer behavior brought about by the pandemic accelerated adoption of technologies as people and businesses adapted to new habits. Kian Bin Teo, chief financial officer of Thunes, a global cross-border payments network headquartered in Singapore, echoed the push.</p><p>\"We see many clients, partners, accelerating their interest to work with us, because of the urgency to go digital,\" he said.</p><p>The company connects financial institutions, technology companies, money transfer operators, and banks, to enable seamless cross-border payments. It reported an <a href=\"https://www.thunes.com/2020/08/17/strong-transaction-volumes-and-partner-expansion-drive-global-payment-network-thunes-q2-2020-growth/\">80% increase in transaction volumes</a> for the second quarter, noting a clear shift toward mobile wallets — a trend accelerated by the push towards digital payments because of the pandemic.</p><p>\"This trend will put us in a very good state for the long-term. It validates that we're on the right path,\" Teo said.</p><p>Others, who were not intrinsically digital, seized the opportunity to innovate. Sin Mui Heng (SMH) Food Industries, which makes chilled and frozen dim sum, were met with operational and supply chain challenges at the start of the pandemic. With hotels and restaurants drastically cutting down their wholesale orders, SMH focused on attracting direct consumers.</p><p>\"We dished out whatever we could in the shortest time. These included direct factory sales, work-from-home dim sum packages, marketing to consumers via Facebook, Instagram; and we got ourselves listed on more online stores,\" <a href=\"https://www.straitstimes.com/business/economy/surviving-supply-chain-shocks-caused-by-covid-19-pandemic\">SMH's Director of Operations Johnson Tay and Director of Business Development Evan Tay</a> told The Straits Times.</p><p>The key to businesses' survival was how quickly business leaders were willing to adapt to a culture of innovation. \"Organizations across Singapore realized how much their ability to innovate fuels their performance and business resilience during the crisis. They were also forced to innovate and accelerate transformation in response to the challenges and new market conditions,\" Sandra Ng of IDC Asia Pacific said in <a href=\"https://news.microsoft.com/en-sg/2020/09/10/culture-of-innovation/\">a recent study</a> released by Microsoft.</p><p>The global trend of protectionism has not gone unnoticed, and being an open economy, Singapore could be adversely affected by it. The pandemic has no doubt prompted countries to \"look inwards,\" S. Iswaran, Singapore's Minister for Communications and Information said. \"[But] we believe that a more effective way to build resilience is through openness and greater diversification.\"</p><p>He points to the country's network of Free Trade Agreements and digital economy agreements which will facilitate businesses to connect seamlessly with overseas partners. In addition, enterprises in Singapore are given financial incentives to embark on digital transformation, not just to overcome the immediate challenges from the pandemic, but also to reap long-term economic benefits.</p><h2><strong>A resilient outlook, built on a strong foundation&#160;</strong></h2><p>Even as the pandemic lingers, the city-state's strong position as a financial and investment hub and its ability to weather shocks puts it in good stead for recovery. It has continued to attract investment — SG$3.3 billion in capital over the first half of 2020 — bringing total funding this year on track to rival the SG$6.5 billion raised the year before.</p><p>Fundraising rounds from tech startups led the pack, with Grab raising its latest Series I round of SG$1.2 billion in February, and logistics startup Ninja Van's SG$390 million in April, <a href=\"https://www.businesstimes.com.sg/garage/singapores-tech-investments-on-track-to-rival-the-s65b-raised-in-2019-pwc\">as noted in a PwC report</a>.</p><p>Notably, robust leadership and swift government responses to transform the economy will go a long way in ensuring the country's continuity. But the most important factor will be in Singapore's forward-looking mindset. Being a small country surrounded by bigger neighbors, it is in the country's DNA to constantly prove and re-invent itself.</p><p>No investment in nurturing, enriching, and advancing its citizens is considered too hefty — helping to continually maintain a competitive edge and keep its place among global leaders.</p><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a border=\"0\"></img></a>\n</div><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/mm8E51qIf_I\" height=\"1\" width=\"1\" alt=\"\"/>","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Thu, 08 Oct 2020 20:04:54 +0000","feedId":22,"bgimg":"https://i.insider.com/5f7f53d9282c500018c796c5?format=jpeg","linkMd5":"751c55561330632bfc736617ebe3b9f0","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx32/cdn27@2020_6/2020/10/09/03-32-46-730_2a4fb6a9e9685bae.webp","destWidth":910,"destHeight":683,"sourceBytes":77296,"destBytes":77296,"author":"insider@insider.com (Fariza Salleh)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/5f3d933742f43f001ddfdeac?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx32/cdn49@2020_5/2020/10/09/03-33-27-038_226c0b9f1ed12d67.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f7f53d9282c500018c796c5?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx32/cdn27@2020_6/2020/10/09/03-32-46-730_2a4fb6a9e9685bae.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f7dd68f94fce90018f7b9db?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx7/cdn13@2020_4/2020/10/09/03-33-32-985_dccaabf0ab90f6c5.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":null,"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=mm8E51qIf_I:UBteqte0C-s:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn17@2020_4/2020/10/09/03-33-34-423_e05a704acddc6e42.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=mm8E51qIf_I:UBteqte0C-s:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx16/cdn65@2020_1/2020/10/09/03-33-31-252_c7b6995af57816bc.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn41@2020_4/2020/10/09/03-33-30-246_740defb435ea442b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=mm8E51qIf_I:UBteqte0C-s:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx24/cdn45@2020_6/2020/10/09/03-33-28-294_95d2cf7af58cedb5.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/mm8E51qIf_I":null},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1602214360919},{"createdTime":"2020-10-09 11:32:40","updatedTime":"2020-10-09 11:32:40","title":"Fly larvae eat food waste and can be turned into animal feed — and it's a trend that's catching on around the world","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/insectipro-kenya-nairobi-food-waste-fly-larvae-2020-10","description":"<div style=\"position:relative; overflow:hidden; padding-bottom:56.25%\">\n<iframe src=\"https://cdn.jwplayer.com/players/r2ICRQAN-jZbcmOYf.html\"\nwidth=\"100%\" height=\"100%\" frameborder=\"0\" scrolling=\"auto\" title=\"Fly larvae eat food waste and can be turned into animal feed — and it's a trend that's catching on around the world\"\nstyle=\"position:absolute;\" allowfullscreen></iframe>\n</div><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>The Kenyan insect farm InsectiPro is chipping away at the 1,900 tons of organic food waste produced in Nairobi every day.</li>\n<li>The farm feeds more than 30 tons of discarded fruit to black soldier fly larvae, then dries and sells the larvae as animal feed.</li>\n<li>Demand for the company's animal feed has increased since the pandemic began.</li>\n<li><strong><a href=\"https://www.facebook.com/BusinessInsiderToday/\" data-analytics-module=\"summary_bullets\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"0\">View more episodes of Business Insider Today on Facebook.</a></strong></li>\n</ul><p>At an insect farm in Kenya, fly larvae are being used to combat food waste.</p><p>It's part of the <a href=\"https://www.insectipro.com/\">InsectiPro</a> farm's mission to chip away at the 1,900 tons of organic waste produced in Nairobi every day.</p><p>InsectiPro uses the larvae of black soldier flies to break down more than 30 tons of discarded fruit each day. The fruit scraps come in from markets, juice companies, and breweries, and are then fed to the larvae.</p><p>From there, the larvae are dried and sold as animal feed.&#160;</p><p>Any excess waste created by these larvae are sold to neighboring farms to use in the soil.</p><p>\"The biggest difference is that the [black soldier fly] manure, the plant converts it very fast, so it is like fertilizer,\" farmer Douglas Njoroge told Reuters. \"It is taken up very fast, it breaks into the soil very well, and it also helps the soil maintain a very good texture.\"</p><p>Talash Huijbers founded InsectriPro two years ago. The farm normally produces around two tons of larvae each day, but the pandemic cut production in half.</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f7f6845ea74820019ca6058?format=jpeg\" alt=\"fly larvae\" height=\"1080\" width=\"1920\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>InsectiPro feeds organic food waste to fly larvae, and then sells them to neighboring farms as animal feed.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Reuters</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p>Meanwhile, border closures slowed imports of other types of animal feed like fishmeal, which is popular in Kenya, creating more demand for InsectiPro's locally sourced larvae. Growing concerns over fishmeal's environmental impact have made room for more sustainable and affordable alternatives like insects.</p><p>InsectiPro isn't alone — entrepreneurs and startups in <a href=\"https://waste-management-world.com/a/in-depth-harvesting-insects-to-recycle-food-waste#:~:text=So%20which%20bugs%20are%20best,house%20fly%20(Musca%20domestica).\">North America</a> and <a href=\"https://www.forbes.com/sites/davidebanis/2019/06/14/can-using-insects-as-animal-feed-reduce-the-climate-impact-of-meat-production/#4acaa33e404a\">Europe</a> are part of the movement, too.</p><p>The company plans to eventually use every part of the insect, including the shell.</p><p>InsectiPro has more abstract goals in mind too, like getting people to think about waste, and these little grubs, in a different way.&#160;</p><p>\"We think InsectiPro is a company of the future, because we are where sustainability and profitability meet,\" Huijbers said. \"And more importantly, we see the beauty within the beast. And I think you should too.\"</p><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a href='https://www.businessinsider.com/insectipro-kenya-nairobi-food-waste-fly-larvae-2020-10'>Business Insider</a></div><div class=\"feedflare\">\n<a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=QKz9nLDliXA:f8gWbP-ezGY:yIl2AUoC8zA\"><img (Dylan Barth)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/5f7f6845ea74820019ca6058?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx18/cdn27@2020_5/2020/10/09/03-33-25-705_cca8fa13a4c7c877.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":null,"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=QKz9nLDliXA:f8gWbP-ezGY:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx/cdn67@2020_5/2020/10/09/03-33-31-997_70926b4644bfde9d.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=QKz9nLDliXA:f8gWbP-ezGY:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx24/cdn95@2020_4/2020/10/09/03-33-30-705_b3b274d6450af6c0.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn41@2020_4/2020/10/09/03-33-30-246_740defb435ea442b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=QKz9nLDliXA:f8gWbP-ezGY:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx32/cdn39@2020_3/2020/10/09/03-33-31-728_0ccfcf3b119f213a.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/QKz9nLDliXA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx13/cdn92@2020_4/2020/10/09/03-33-30-663_c879e104e17dc402.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1602214360895},{"createdTime":"2020-10-09 11:32:40","updatedTime":"2020-10-09 11:32:40","title":"This robot vacuum easily cleaned my carpet, and coffee grounds, kitty litter, and flour from my hardwood floors","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/neato-robotics-botvac-d7-connected-robot-vacuum-review","description":"<p class=\"financial-disclaimer\"><i>When you buy through our links, we may earn money from our affiliate partners. <a href=\"https://www.insider-inc.com/commerce-on-insider-inc/\">Learn more.</a></i></p><p><a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B078MPFN55/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=biip_040419_neato-robotics-connected-vacuum-product-review-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B078MPFN55&linkId=840e80adc4a081866f6dfb3414892b07c4a081866f6dfb3414892b07\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"$800 is definitely a lot to pay for a vacuum, but this one from Neato Robotics is worth it for me. It has smart technology to map out my entire house and can be programmed to clean daily.\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow sponsored\"><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5ca60b0ec6cc5071db026cdc?format=jpeg\" alt=\"NEATO D7 vacuum\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>$800 is definitely a lot to pay for a vacuum, but this one from Neato Robotics is worth it for me. It has smart technology to map out my entire house and can be programmed to clean daily.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Amazon</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></a></p><ul class=\"summary-list\"><li><strong>A high-quality robot vacuum removes a wide array of debris from pet hair to crumbs, is easy to schedule, and requires minimal maintenance — all without needing to be monitored regularly.</strong></li><li><strong>The <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B078MPFN55/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=biip_040419_neato-robotics-connected-vacuum-product-review-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B078MPFN55&linkId=840e80adc4a081866f6dfb3414892b07c4a081866f6dfb3414892b07\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">Neato Robotics D7 Connected Robot Vacuum</a> is definitely expensive at&#160;<a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B078MPFN55/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=biip_040419_neato-robotics-connected-vacuum-product-review-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B078MPFN55&linkId=840e80adc4a081866f6dfb3414892b07c4a081866f6dfb3414892b07\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">around $600</a> but it does all of the above and has several high-end features, including zone cleaning, two hours of battery life, and three ultra-performance filters.</strong></li><li><strong>I also like the <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B078MPFN55/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=biip_040419_neato-robotics-connected-vacuum-product-review-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B078MPFN55&linkId=840e80adc4a081866f6dfb3414892b07c4a081866f6dfb3414892b07\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Neato Robotics D7 Connected Robot Vacuum</a> because I can barely hear it when it's running in the next room, and it works with Alexa. </strong><strong>There's also a one-year limited warranty in case something happens to the machine — something you definitely want with an expensive item.</strong></li><li>If you're looking for more options, check out our guide to <strong><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-robot-vacuum\" rel=\"nofollow\">best robot vacuums</a></strong>, many of which may go on sale during <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/amazon-prime-day-best-deals\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Amazon Prime Day on October 13-14</a>.</li><li><strong><a href=\"https://newsletter.businessinsider.com/join/4np/insider-picks\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\" data-stringify-link=\"https://newsletter.businessinsider.com/join/4np/insider-picks\" data-sk=\"tooltip_parent\">Sign up for Insider Reviews' weekly newsletter for more buying advice and great deals.</a></strong></li></ul><div id=\"ProductCard_5d126832e3ecba07e47d9b63\" style=\"position:relative; display:block; width: 100%\"><iframe src=\"https://produktor.businessinsider.com/productCardService?id=5d126832e3ecba07e47d9b63&type=small&live=true\" width=\"100%\" height=\"150%\" frameborder=\"0\" allowfullscreen=\"\" style=\"position:absolute; top:0; left: 0\"></iframe></div><p>I love robot vacuums. It's the easiest way to clean my messy house without requiring me to do much more than press a button. There are <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-robot-vacuum\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">nice machines at a variety of price points</a> that can go from hardwood to shaggy carpets without issues, empty their own dustbin, mop your floor, and more, but one that stands out for me is the top-of-the-line <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B078MPFN55/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=biip_040419_neato-robotics-connected-vacuum-product-review-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B078MPFN55&linkId=840e80adc4a081866f6dfb3414892b07c4a081866f6dfb3414892b07\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow sponsored\">D7 Connected Robot Vacuum</a> from California-based Neato Robotics. I've been using it in my own home for a while, and in my experience, it is worth the $600 price tag — here's why.</p><h2><strong>Design</strong></h2><p>Unlike conventional robovacs, Neato's are all D-shaped, including the D7. This helps with cleaning corners better than others in my opinion and just looks really unique and interesting.&#160;</p><p><a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B078MPFN55/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=biip_040419_neato-robotics-connected-vacuum-product-review-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B078MPFN55&linkId=840e80adc4a081866f6dfb3414892b07c4a081866f6dfb3414892b07\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">The D7</a> measures 12.5 inches by 13 inches by 4 inches. The four-inch height is higher than most robo vacs, which means it might have a harder time getting under low-clearance furniture, but wasn't an issue in my experience.&#160;</p><h2><strong>Specs</strong></h2><ul><li>13.21 inch x 12.56 inch x 3.92 inch</li><li>7.5 lbs</li><li>0.7 liters dustbin capacity</li><li>High capacity lithium ion battery with up to 120 minutes and up to 150 minutes charge time</li><li>Quick boost charging</li><li>Battery recharge and resume (up to 2 times)</li></ul><h2><strong>Set-up process</strong></h2><bi-shortcode id=\"related-article-module\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-type=\"592849e2b74af4481b8b464b\" data-title=\"The best robot vacuums\" data-url=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-robot-vacuum\" data-thumbnail=\"https://i.insider.com/5f1765d43f737009b9250a45\" data-shortcode-display-text=\"Related Article Module: The best robot vacuums\">&#160;</bi-shortcode><p>The instructions are easy to understand so set up only took about half an hour, most of which was spent trying to find the wireless connection after setting up the dock and downloading the Neato app. I just had to go through the connection process a few times before it actually connected. I finished by upgrading the firmware and then charged the vac for an hour and a half before taking it for a spin.&#160;</p><h2><strong>Review of <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B078MPFN55/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=biip_040419_neato-robotics-connected-vacuum-product-review-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B078MPFN55&linkId=840e80adc4a081866f6dfb3414892b07c4a081866f6dfb3414892b07\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow sponsored\">Neato D7</a></strong></h2><p><a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B078MPFN55/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=biip_040419_neato-robotics-connected-vacuum-product-review-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B078MPFN55&linkId=840e80adc4a081866f6dfb3414892b07c4a081866f6dfb3414892b07\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"It cleaned over my carpet and hardwood floors without any major problems.\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow sponsored\"><strong><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5ca60c4a16c9584b6f5e833d?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Neato D7 3\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>It cleaned over my carpet and hardwood floors without any major problems.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Amazon</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></strong></a></p><p>If I'm going to use a robovac, I don't want to monitor it as it goes around my house. That's why I love that this one uses \"laser smart technology\" to map your home. You can set \"no-go lines\" after it maps each room so <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B078MPFN55/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=biip_040419_neato-robotics-connected-vacuum-product-review-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B078MPFN55&linkId=840e80adc4a081866f6dfb3414892b07c4a081866f6dfb3414892b07\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">the D7</a> automatically knows not to cross over a heavily-wired area. You can also save up to three maps so you can conceivably use this vacuum to clean three floors, should you be so lucky to have that much space.</p><p>The vacuum also comes with three ultra-performance filters designed to pick up 99% of allergens and dust mites. And, you can choose between eco and turbo cleaning modes; with turbo mode, the D7 uses maximum suction to pick up debris as small as 10 microns. Cleaning&#160;the <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B078MPFN55/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=biip_040419_neato-robotics-connected-vacuum-product-review-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B078MPFN55&linkId=840e80adc4a081866f6dfb3414892b07c4a081866f6dfb3414892b07\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow sponsored\">Neato D7</a> is relatively easy, which I appreciate since I use the vac daily. After each cycle, you remove the dustbin from the top of the vac and tap out as much gunk from the filter as you can, or use the attached cleaning tool to cut out hairs and fibers off the brush. The filter has a screen over it so you can't really use the cleaning tool to brush out the debris.</p><p>To test how well <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B078MPFN55/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=biip_040419_neato-robotics-connected-vacuum-product-review-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B078MPFN55&linkId=840e80adc4a081866f6dfb3414892b07c4a081866f6dfb3414892b07\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">the D7</a> actually cleans up, I put a few tablespoons each of all-purpose flour, coffee grounds, and kitty litter on my carpet and hardwood floor and let the D7 do a cleaning cycle. On both the carpet and hardwood, the vacuum removed all of the coffee grounds and kitty litter without a trace leftover.</p><p>The flour was a bit trickier, which seems to be the norm for robotic vacuums. On the carpet, it removed about 90% of the flour; on the hardwood, it was closer to 75%. I also sprinkled flour in corners of different rooms and though the vac didn't get everything, it came within a quarter of an inch of the corners, which is better than any of the other robotic vacuums I've tested.</p><p><a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B078MPFN55/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=biip_040419_neato-robotics-connected-vacuum-product-review-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B078MPFN55&linkId=840e80adc4a081866f6dfb3414892b07c4a081866f6dfb3414892b07\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">The D7</a> also does a great job with pet hair, which I didn't have to purposely set out because we have two cats who get the job done just fine. When I run the vacuum on its regular schedule, I didn't notice any cat hair left on the floor.</p><p>As far as noise levels go, this is also the quietest robotic vacuum I've ever tested. My sound meter measured it at 66 decibels from a foot away, which is just slightly louder than a normal conversation from three feet away.&#160;</p><bi-shortcode id=\"related-article-module\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-type=\"5a522912c32ae6751a8b4b8b\" data-title=\"This new robot vacuum is one of the best investments you can make to save time this year\" data-url=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/eufy-robovac-11-plus-robot-vacuum-review-2018-1\" data-thumbnail=\"https://i.insider.com/5a539d783225deb4198b4d37\" data-shortcode-display-text=\"Related Article Module: This new robot vacuum is one of the best investments you can make to save time this year\">&#160;</bi-shortcode><p>The \"Connected\" part of <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B078MPFN55/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=biip_040419_neato-robotics-connected-vacuum-product-review-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B078MPFN55&linkId=840e80adc4a081866f6dfb3414892b07c4a081866f6dfb3414892b07\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow sponsored\">D7's</a> name comes from its smart capabilities. You can control the vacuum using the Neato app, Google Home and Assistant, Amazon Alexa, Apple Watch, and Samsung SmartThings. I tested it out using my Alexa and couldn't help but marvel at the world we now live in — I can now talk to <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/netgear-orbi-voice-mesh-router-system-review\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">my Wi-Fi router</a> and tell my robotic vacuum to start cleaning. Or you can just schedule the vac to clean at a specific time each day in the app, which I do.&#160;</p><h2><strong>Cons to consider</strong></h2><p><a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B078MPFN55/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=biip_040419_neato-robotics-connected-vacuum-product-review-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B078MPFN55&linkId=840e80adc4a081866f6dfb3414892b07c4a081866f6dfb3414892b07\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"The floors of my house were strewn with toys so the vacuum had some trouble getting to certain areas.\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow sponsored\"><strong><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5ca60ca2c6cc504f8f7a8064?format=jpeg\" alt=\"NEATO D7 4\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>The floors of my house were strewn with toys so the vacuum had some trouble getting to certain areas.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Amazon</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></strong></a></p><p>&#160;<a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B078MPFN55/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=biip_040419_neato-robotics-connected-vacuum-product-review-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B078MPFN55&linkId=840e80adc4a081866f6dfb3414892b07c4a081866f6dfb3414892b07\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">The D7</a> would get stuck about half of the time I ran a cleaning cycle, which is really annoying when you just want it to clean and go back to its dock when it's done. But I probably shouldn't lay all of the blame on the Neato. Between having a five-year-old and just not putting much emphasis on tidiness, I gave the vacuum plenty of obstacles to conquer and it definitely had the most trouble with small toys that were left out.</p><p>Overall, the app is useful. It tells you when your Neato is stuck and when to empty the dustbin, and you can easily buy replacement parts and access maintenance tutorials. At the same time though, I wasn't incredibly impressed. Many times when I wanted <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B078MPFN55/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=biip_040419_neato-robotics-connected-vacuum-product-review-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B078MPFN55&linkId=840e80adc4a081866f6dfb3414892b07c4a081866f6dfb3414892b07\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">the D7</a> to dock or start cleaning, I would have to wait a few minutes for it to connect. I also couldn't get the zone cleaning to operate correctly because the device may have had trouble accurately mapping our constantly changing decor or the obstacle course made up of toys strewn everywhere.&#160;&#160;</p><p>Like I mentioned earlier, it's also <em>really</em> expensive.</p><h2><strong>The bottom line</strong></h2><p>Overall, I'm happy with how the <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B078MPFN55/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=biip_040419_neato-robotics-connected-vacuum-product-review-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B078MPFN55&linkId=840e80adc4a081866f6dfb3414892b07c4a081866f6dfb3414892b07\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">Neato Robotics D7 Connected Robot Vacuum</a> performed. When it comes down to it, the ability to clean a floor is the most important (and basic) feature a vacuum should have and the D7 delivers the goods without making a loud production of it. I could take or leave the mapping and Alexa functionality, but they are kind of fun tools to have at my disposal. If you are looking for a robotic vacuum with all of the bells and whistles <em>and</em> you have the ability to spend top dollar, you should definitely give the <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B078MPFN55/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=biip_040419_neato-robotics-connected-vacuum-product-review-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B078MPFN55&linkId=840e80adc4a081866f6dfb3414892b07c4a081866f6dfb3414892b07\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">D7 Connected</a> a try.</p><p><strong>Pros:</strong> Works with Alexa, gets deep into corners, runs quietly, two-hour battery life, does an excellent job of sucking up debris</p><p><strong>Cons:</strong> Had trouble finishing cleaning cycles in my cluttered home, difficulties setting up zone cleaning, very expensive</p><div 11:32:40","updatedTime":"2020-10-09 11:32:40","title":"SoulCycle rolls out at-home bike nationally, adding new unlimited streaming program and expanded financing options for riders","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/soulcycle-at-home-bike-goes-national-bid-to-compete-peloton-2020-10","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f7f4ab4282c500018c7968f?format=jpeg\" alt=\"soulcycle outside\" height=\"1331\" width=\"1780\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>An outdoor SoulCycle class in Manhattan.\n<p class=\"copyright\"><a href=\"https://www.gettyimages.com/detail/news-photo/people-attend-an-outdoor-soulcycle-class-at-the-hudson-news-photo/1271598740?adppopup=true\" target=\"_blank\">Noam Galai/Getty Images</a></p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>SoulCycle announced on Wednesday that it's at-home stationary bicycle is available nationwide, after first launching in select markets in March.&#160;</li>\n<li>As part of the rollout, SoulCycle announced a new unlimited streaming membership program available through Variis, an app developed by parent company, Equinox. Riders also now have access to financing options and a monthly payment plan for the $2,500 bicycle.&#160;</li>\n<li>In addition to the bike's likeness in design to Peloton, SoulCycle's new app and financing programs very closely mirror those of its competitor, in a clear bid for a piece of the growing at-home fitness market.&#160;</li>\n<li>\"There is a cult following with SoulCycle, so I think they will be very successful in bringing people over to their new system,\" Claude Zdanow, founder and CEO of Stadiumred Group, told Business Insider.&#160;</li>\n<li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories</a>.</li>\n</ul><p>Fitness buffs struggling to get their hands on a Peloton thanks to <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/peloton-ceo-warns-of-months-order-delays-overwhelming-demand-2020-9\">extensive back orders and delays amid the pandemic</a> now have another option at their disposal — the SoulCycle at-home bike.&#160;</p><p>The bike — which was first announced in March, and available only in select markets — made its national debut on Wednesday, along with a new unlimited streaming membership program and expanded payment options. In addition to the bike's likeness in design to Peloton, SoulCycle's new app and financing programs very closely mirror those of its top competitor. The move is considered a clear bid for a piece of the fast-growing virtual fitness market.&#160;&#160;</p><p>According to the <a href=\"https://www.soul-cycle.com/at-home?%24web_only=true&utm_source=braze&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=mass_variis_dtclaunch_wed_20201007&utm_content=shop&%243p=e_ab&%24original_url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.soul-cycle.com%2Fat-home%3F%2524web_only%3Dtrue%26utm_source%3Dbraze%26utm_medium%3Demail%26utm_campaign%3Dmass_variis_dtclaunch_wed_20201007%26utm_content%3Dshop&_branch_match_id=662388332898255368_match_id=662388332898255368\">SoulCycle website</a> and an email sent to riders, Variis <strong>—</strong> SoulCycle's mobile app created by parent company Equinox — will power a \"clip in now, pay later\" program for the $2,500 bike, allowing riders to split payments for up to 39 months. Peloton's existing financing option permits users to pay for equipment across 49 months using Affirm.</p><p>Users will also have the option of either purchasing ad-hoc streaming classes directly from a studio of their choice, or paying $39.99 for unlimited access to live and on-demand classes through Variis.</p><p><em><strong>Read more</strong>: <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/soulcycle-scandal-ceo-melanie-whelan-spin-bullying-peloton-equinox-2020-9\">After expensing $5,100 in Dior bags, SoulCycle's CEO was suddenly out. Now, an executive exodus and a culture war threaten to send the company off a cliff.</a></em></p><p>Much like Peloton's membership program, the Variis app includes a variety of off-bike offerings and is available to users that do not own an exercise bike. The app, which is currently available for a 7-day trial period, includes access to classes and programming from other Equinox fitness brands, including Pure Yoga and Precision Run.</p><p>SoulCycle did not immediately respond to Business Insider's request to comment on the national rollout and new programming.</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f7f4a11c655f6001969eff9?format=jpeg\" alt=\"SoulCycle at-home bike\" height=\"588\" width=\"785\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>The SoulCycle at-home bike.\n<p class=\"copyright\">SoulCycle</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p>SoulCycle's bike marks the latest attempt among Peloton's biggest cycling competitors to replicate its wildly successful model, to varying success. In February, Flywheel — which filed for <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/flywheel-sports-filing-for-bankruptcy-and-closing-all-studios-2020-9\">Chapter 7 bankruptcy in September</a> — announced that it would permanently shutter all studios and <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/flywheel-at-home-shuts-down-trade-in-bike-free-peloton-2020-2\">rescinded its at-home bike and membership service</a> after Peloton sued the company for patent infringement, specifically copying its proprietary design and technology. Meanwhile, companies <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/virtual-fitness-streaming-subscriptions-exercise-program-peloton-pandemic-2020-9#ob-6\">ranging from tech giants like Apple</a> to emerging fitness brands like Obé have launched competitor membership programs this year.&#160;</p><p>Now, SoulCycle will also take a stab at capturing a piece of the increasingly lucrative at-home fitness market. And while <a href=\"https://www.nytimes.com/2020/05/19/style/soulcycle-peloton-home-exercise-bikes-coronavirus.html\">some experts have previously anticipated</a> the company will continue to face an uphill battle against Peloton, particularly coming to market so late in the pandemic, others say the company's rabid following may help it carve a niche.&#160;</p><p>\"There is a cult following with SoulCycle, so I think they will be very successful in bringing people over to their new system,\" Claude Zdanow, founder and CEO of marketing agency holding company Stadiumred Group, told Business Insider.&#160;</p><p>SoulCycle's national rollout also comes on the heels of Peloton announcing a cheaper version of its wildly popular stationary bicycle in September, part of a push from founder and CEO John Foley to democratize the brand and reach new consumers.</p><p>\"Our goal is to be the go-to at-home fitness solution for as many people as possible,\" John Foley, Peloton CEO and co-founder, said in a statement&#160;<a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/peloton-is-reportedly-launching-cheaper-treadmill-and-a-premium-bike-2020-9\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"100\" data-uri=\"3b81aa1dddf519fcc8e0c7ee4bc34f6e\">after announcing the cheaper bike.</a>&#160;\"And with these new product launches, we'll be able to offer access to Peloton's best-in-class fitness content at various price points, depending on what consumers are looking for, especially in a world where people are increasingly working out at home.\"</p><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a href='https://www.businessinsider.com/soulcycle-at-home-bike-goes-national-bid-to-compete-peloton-2020-10'>Business Insider</a></div><div height=\"1\" width=\"1\" alt=\"\"/>","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Thu, 08 Oct 2020 20:29:14 +0000","feedId":22,"bgimg":"https://i.insider.com/5f7f4ab4282c500018c7968f?format=jpeg","linkMd5":"cc681ba668f49ff3e2877b8571168327","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx12/cdn16@2020_2/2020/10/09/03-32-41-193_1452482b2349b55f.webp","destWidth":1780,"destHeight":1331,"sourceBytes":197998,"destBytes":197998,"author":"insider@insider.com (Bethany Biron)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/5f7f4ab4282c500018c7968f?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx12/cdn16@2020_2/2020/10/09/03-32-41-193_1452482b2349b55f.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f7f4a11c655f6001969eff9?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx32/cdn9@2020_1/2020/10/09/03-33-30-105_3dcb575f40fe6edb.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":null,"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=J5jxBg1Fmjw:CxL_Vy7NtcQ:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx1/cdn97@2020_5/2020/10/09/03-33-29-992_21941cca4050dce9.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=J5jxBg1Fmjw:CxL_Vy7NtcQ:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx18/cdn35@2020_1/2020/10/09/03-33-31-750_654d3579d5a1508e.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn41@2020_4/2020/10/09/03-33-30-246_740defb435ea442b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=J5jxBg1Fmjw:CxL_Vy7NtcQ:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx7/cdn39@2020_4/2020/10/09/03-33-29-014_5c55b09aaf49fc77.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/J5jxBg1Fmjw":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx18/cdn59@2020_3/2020/10/09/03-33-27-531_053ced6c40eb369b.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1602214360900},{"createdTime":"2020-10-09 11:32:40","updatedTime":"2020-10-09 11:32:40","title":"How to get a refund on your PS4 using the chat support feature on the PlayStation website","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-get-a-refund-on-ps4","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f7f9db64c3b2e0019bba08b?format=jpeg\" alt=\"PlayStation 4 PS4 Slim\" height=\"1499\" width=\"2999\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Depending on the situation, you can get a refund using the chat support feature on the PlayStation website.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Jomic/Shutterstock</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li><strong>You can get a refund on your PS4 for a PlayStation Store purchase through the PlayStation website's customer support chat.</strong></li>\n<li><strong>You'll have the best chance of getting a refund if you request it within two weeks of your purchase, and haven't downloaded or opened it.</strong></li>\n<li><strong>Once you answer a few preset questions, a live PlayStation representative will help you with your refund request.</strong></li>\n<li><strong><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/tech-reference\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-module=\"summary_bullets\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"0\">Visit Business Insider's Tech Reference library for more stories</a>.</strong></li>\n</ul>\n<p>If you've made a purchase in the <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/category/playstation-store\">PlayStation Store</a> and have decided that you want a refund, or you've found charges on your account that you didn't make, it's possible to request a refund. Depending on the type of content you want to be refunded for, you might be able to get a refund through the <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/category/playstation-network\">PlayStation Network</a>.&#160;</p><p>The specifics regarding your refund largely depend on the type of content you are seeking to be refunded for. Most content can be refunded if you request a refund within 14 days of purchase and have not downloaded or streamed the content in question.</p><p>If you're not sure where to start when it comes to requesting a refund, the <a href=\"http://bestbuy.7tiv.net/c/196318/614286/10014?subId1=bitht_110819_get-a-refund-on-ps4&u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bestbuy.com%2Fsite%2Fsony-playstation-4-1tb-fortnite-neo-versa-console-bundle-jet-black%2F6360910.p%3FskuId%3D63609100910\" rel=\"nofollow\">PS4</a> chat support bot is here to help. Follow this guide to get started.</p><h3>Check out the products mentioned in this article:</h3><h4><a href=\"http://bestbuy.7tiv.net/c/196318/614286/10014?subId1=bitht_110819_get-a-refund-on-ps4&u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bestbuy.com%2Fsite%2Fsony-playstation-4-1tb-fortnite-neo-versa-console-bundle-jet-black%2F6360910.p%3FskuId%3D63609100910\" rel=\"nofollow nofollow\">PlayStation 4 (From $299.99 at Best Buy)</a></h4><h2><strong>How to get a refund on <a href=\"http://bestbuy.7tiv.net/c/196318/614286/10014?subId1=bitht_110819_get-a-refund-on-ps4&u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bestbuy.com%2Fsite%2Fsony-playstation-4-1tb-fortnite-neo-versa-console-bundle-jet-black%2F6360910.p%3FskuId%3D63609100910\" rel=\"nofollow\">PS4</a> using chat support</strong></h2><p><strong>1. </strong>Click the \"Chat\" button on the right side of the <a href=\"https://support.playstation.com/s/article/Requesting-a-Refund?language=en_US\">PS4 webpage</a> for refund support.</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5dc5cdcb3afd37614a2ed085?format=jpeg\" alt=\"How to get a refund on PS4\" height=\"1080\" width=\"1920\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Click the blue &#34;Chat&#34; button.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Chrissy Montelli/Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p><strong>2. </strong>In the pop-up chat window, click on \"New refund request.\"</p><p><strong>3. </strong>Click \"I'm ready.\"</p><p><strong>4. </strong>For question one, click \"Yes, I am\" to confirm you were the person whose account was charged for the purchase. The owner of the account is the only one who can request a refund for the purchase.</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5dc5cded7eece562c05f75b6?format=jpeg\" alt=\"How to get a refund on PS4\" height=\"1080\" width=\"1920\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Click &#34;Yes, I am.&#34;\n<p class=\"copyright\">Chrissy Montelli/Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p><strong>5. </strong>For question two, click on the payment method you used when making the purchase.&#160;</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5dc5ce0f3afd3762307b3ff2?format=jpeg\" alt=\"How to get a refund on PS4\" height=\"1080\" width=\"1920\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Select your payment method.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Chrissy Montelli/Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p><strong>6. </strong>For question three, click \"Yes, I am\" to confirm that the payment method used is in your name. Similar to question one, if the payment method belongs to someone else, they are the only one who can request a refund for the purchase.</p><p><strong>7. </strong>For question four, click on the option that most closely matches the reason for your refund request.&#160;</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5dc5ce357eece563211f7e57?format=jpeg\" alt=\"How to get a refund on PS4\" height=\"1080\" width=\"1920\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Select the reason for your refund request.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Chrissy Montelli/Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p><strong>8. </strong>For question five, click \"Yes\" if you have already downloaded the content for which you want a refund. If you have not already downloaded said content, click \"No.\"</p><p><strong>9. </strong>For question six, click \"Yes\" if you are requesting a refund for the first time with your PlayStation Network account. If you've requested a refund before, click \"No.\" If you're not sure, click \"Unsure.\" If you click \"Yes,\" answer question 6.5 by clicking on the option that most closely resembles the reason for your previous refund request.&#160;</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5dc5ce637eece5637e615963?format=jpeg\" alt=\"How to get a refund on PS4\" height=\"1080\" width=\"1920\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Select the reason for your previous refund, if you&#39;ve made one.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Chrissy Montelli/Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p><strong>10. </strong>For question seven, type in the number of days that have passed since you first made the purchase, then click on the blue arrow to the right of the screen.</p><p><strong>11. </strong>If you want to connect with a live agent to process the refund, click \"Next.\" If you don't want to go through with the refund after all, click \"Nevermind.\"</p><p>The live agent will help you along through the rest of the refund process, including determining whether or not you qualify for a refund.</p><h2><strong>Related coverage from&#160;<a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/category/tech-how-to\">How To Do Everything: Tech</a>:</strong></h2><ul><li><h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-turn-off-ps4\">How to turn a PS4 on or off, or put it into Rest Mode, using the controller or system</a></h3></li><li><h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/does-ps4-pro-play-4k\">'Does the PS4 Pro play 4K games?': Yes, and it can also play 4K movies — here's how to set it up</a></h3></li><li><h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-turn-off-parental-controls-on-ps4\">How to turn off parental controls on a PS4, with or without your parental controls password</a></h3></li><li><h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-get-netflix-on-ps4\">How to get Netflix on a PS4 to watch TV shows and movies from your console</a></h3></li></ul><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a href='https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-get-a-refund-on-ps4'>Business Insider</a></div><div (Chrissy Montelli)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/5f7f9db64c3b2e0019bba08b?format=jpeg":null,"https://i.insider.com/5dc5cdcb3afd37614a2ed085?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn20@2020_3/2020/10/09/03-33-27-113_ab9777c722cecef2.webp","https://i.insider.com/5dc5cded7eece562c05f75b6?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx24/cdn21@2020_6/2020/10/09/03-33-32-379_58770d81f7daec1c.webp","https://i.insider.com/5dc5ce0f3afd3762307b3ff2?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx30/cdn64@2020_2/2020/10/09/03-33-30-648_91617437e798e55c.webp","https://i.insider.com/5dc5ce357eece563211f7e57?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx3/cdn87@2020_4/2020/10/09/03-33-27-743_cf7f4cdca480e1c7.webp","https://i.insider.com/5dc5ce637eece5637e615963?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx31/cdn51@2020_3/2020/10/09/03-33-25-878_3a770bd26ede71e6.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":null,"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=hFai69td3ds:tZ3wQ1Y8_58:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx25/cdn72@2020_6/2020/10/09/03-33-32-686_9d8eb60af651cedc.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=hFai69td3ds:tZ3wQ1Y8_58:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx2/cdn35@2020_1/2020/10/09/03-33-31-130_388148b2a3312300.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn41@2020_4/2020/10/09/03-33-30-246_740defb435ea442b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=hFai69td3ds:tZ3wQ1Y8_58:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx11/cdn40@2020_3/2020/10/09/03-33-35-421_4d2a1231f3ecb415.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/hFai69td3ds":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx12/cdn8@2020_2/2020/10/09/03-33-25-488_6e565222856ad278.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1602214360907},{"createdTime":"2020-10-09 11:32:40","updatedTime":"2020-10-09 11:32:40","title":"Apple's big iPhone update just made the AirPods Pro even better with a new surround sound feature that feels like you're in a movie theater","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/apple-airpods-pro-spatial-audio-update-ios-14-2020-10","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5db8ad29dee019695d0ea3ba?format=jpeg\" alt=\"apple air pod pro\" height=\"1666\" width=\"2221\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Apple&#39;s AirPods Pro\n<p class=\"copyright\">Crystal Cox/Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>Apple's iOS 14 update brings a new feature called spatial audio to the AirPods Pro.</li>\n<li>Spatial audio gives the AirPods Pro a surround sound effect, making audio feel more open and immersive.</li>\n<li>The AirPods Pro can track your head movements, making it possible to adjust the audio accordingly as you move.</li>\n<li>It's available on iPhone 7 or later and on certain iPad models.</li>\n<li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories</a>.</li>\n</ul><p>Apple's iOS 14 update didn't just bring improvements to the iPhone — it's introduced a couple of new features for AirPods as well.</p><p>Most notably, AirPods Pro owners will now be able to take advantage of a new feature called spatial audio. As its name implies, spatial audio creates an effect that makes it feel like the sound is coming from a surround sound speaker rather than from your AirPods. The result is a more immersive sound that adjusts automatically as you move your head or your iPhone, making it almost feel like you're in a movie theater.</p><p>The addition shows that Apple is investing in new features for AirPods beyond hardware-based upgrades, which can hopefully make Apple's wireless earbuds continue to feel new and fresh even after years of use. It also shows how audio technology is becoming <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/apple-over-ear-headphones-launch-soon-sonos-bose-disappear-store-2020-10\">a more important part of Apple's core product lineup</a> as it's rumored to be working on a cheaper new HomePod speaker and its first pair of over-ear premium headphones.</p><p>I tried out the AirPods Pro's spatial audio when watching \"The Mandalorian\" on Disney Plus and \"See\" on Apple TV Plus, and found that it provided a much more open sound. With the content playing on my phone, which was placed to my right on my couch, it sounded like the audio was coming from several directions, especially right in front of me.</p><p>If I didn't know any better, I would have checked to make sure my AirPods were connected properly since the audio sounded so expansive and not like it was coming from earbuds. Without spatial audio turned on, the content sounded much more contained and concentrated.&#160;&#160;</p><p>If you want to use spatial audio with your AirPods, you'll have to make sure you own a pair of AirPods Pro and an iPhone 7 or later. The feature also works when using AirPods Pro with the third-generation 12.9-inch iPad Pro, the 11-inch iPad Pro, the third-generation iPad Air, the sixth-generation iPad, and the fifth-generation iPad mini. Of course, all of these devices will need to be running iOS 14 or the latest version of iPadOS.</p><p>You'll also want to make sure spatial audio is turned on. To do this, open your iPhone's settings menu, tap \"Bluetooth,\" and look for your AirPods Pro in the list of devices. Tap the \"i\" button next to it and make sure the \"Spatial Audio\" switch is activated. You can also control spatial audio by launching the Control Center and pressing and holding on the volume bar. Any content encoded in 5.1 or 7.1 surround sound or Dolby Atmos should work.&#160;</p><p>It's one of the few features Apple has added to AirPods in iOS 14, along with battery notifications that can alert you when your headphones need to be charged and automatic switching between devices.&#160;</p><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a href='https://www.businessinsider.com/apple-airpods-pro-spatial-audio-update-ios-14-2020-10'>Business Insider</a></div><div class=\"feedflare\">\n<a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=oFuQbjyQmSg:J2cTklvtYYw:yIl2AUoC8zA\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA\" border=\"0\"></img></a> <a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=oFuQbjyQmSg:J2cTklvtYYw:F7zBnMyn0Lo\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=oFuQbjyQmSg:J2cTklvtYYw:F7zBnMyn0Lo\" border=\"0\"></img></a> <a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=oFuQbjyQmSg:J2cTklvtYYw:V_sGLiPBpWU\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=oFuQbjyQmSg:J2cTklvtYYw:V_sGLiPBpWU\" border=\"0\"></img></a> <a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=oFuQbjyQmSg:J2cTklvtYYw:qj6IDK7rITs\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs\" border=\"0\"></img></a> <a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=oFuQbjyQmSg:J2cTklvtYYw:gIN9vFwOqvQ\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=oFuQbjyQmSg:J2cTklvtYYw:gIN9vFwOqvQ\" border=\"0\"></img></a>\n</div><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/oFuQbjyQmSg\" height=\"1\" width=\"1\" alt=\"\"/>","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Thu, 08 Oct 2020 18:49:07 +0000","feedId":22,"bgimg":"https://i.insider.com/5db8ad29dee019695d0ea3ba?format=jpeg","linkMd5":"d7316244dc5c10a3741eadf9624ae56f","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn6@2020_2/2020/10/09/03-32-41-236_3fb02b9eca6d648b.webp","destWidth":2221,"destHeight":1666,"sourceBytes":97592,"destBytes":97592,"author":"leadicicco@businessinsider.com (Lisa Eadicicco)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/5db8ad29dee019695d0ea3ba?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn6@2020_2/2020/10/09/03-32-41-236_3fb02b9eca6d648b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":null,"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=oFuQbjyQmSg:J2cTklvtYYw:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx4/cdn92@2020_5/2020/10/09/03-33-35-609_93984dc3924c47fc.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=oFuQbjyQmSg:J2cTklvtYYw:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx33/cdn59@2020_2/2020/10/09/03-33-28-226_25ca652af75d8fc7.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn41@2020_4/2020/10/09/03-33-30-246_740defb435ea442b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=oFuQbjyQmSg:J2cTklvtYYw:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx21/cdn76@2020_6/2020/10/09/03-33-31-316_6070d99749b35083.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/oFuQbjyQmSg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn6@2020_3/2020/10/09/03-33-32-019_bc8a770b712db23c.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1602214360902},{"createdTime":"2020-10-09 11:32:40","updatedTime":"2020-10-09 11:32:40","title":"The states where you can and can't post a 'ballot selfie' on social media","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/can-i-post-photo-of-my-ballot-selfie-polling-place-2020-10","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f7f64e10f9900001939ee77?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Voting photo\" height=\"1000\" width=\"2000\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Cheryl Greenberg takes a photo of friends before the start of a parade of over 300 golf carts supporting Democratic Presidential candidate Joe Biden caravanned to the Sumter County Elections office to cast their ballots during early voting Wednesday, Oct. 7, 2020, in The Villages, Fla.\n<p class=\"copyright\">AP Photo/John Raoux</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>With early and mail-in voting underway, excited American voters are posting photos of their mail-in or in-person ballots online to show their civic pride.&#160;</li>\n<li>Taking a photo of your marked ballot and posting it on social media, sometimes referred to as a \"ballot selfie,\" could be illegal in your state.</li>\n<li>Many states also prohibit or limit the use of cell phones and photography in in-person voting locations to protect the privacy of other voters.&#160;</li>\n<li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories</a>.</li>\n</ul><p>A record number of Americans could cast ballots by mail or early this year, and due to the COVID-19 pandemic, Americans are increasingly turning to social media to show that they voted.&#160;</p><p>Lots of excited voters are already posting photos of their mail-in or in-person ballots online. But taking a photo of your marked ballot and posting it on social media, sometimes referred to as a \"ballot selfie,\" could be illegal in your state.</p><p>While most states don't ban posting ballot photos on social media specifically, many have laws prohibiting voters from showing their marked ballot to others, laws that were enacted to protect voters' right to a secret ballot and to discourage bribery, vote-buying, and voter coercion.&#160;</p><div class=\"insider-raw-embed\"><iframe title=\"Where you can and can't post a picture of your completed ballot\" aria-label=\"map\" id=\"datawrapper-chart-lhk7Z\" src=\"https://datawrapper.dwcdn.net/lhk7Z/1/\" scrolling=\"no\" frameborder=\"0\" style=\"width: 0; min-width: 100% ; border: none;\" height=\"489\"></iframe><script type=\"text/javascript\">!function(){\"use strict\";window.addEventListener(\"message\",(function(a){if(void 0!==a.data[\"datawrapper-height\"])for(var e in a.data[\"datawrapper-height\"]){var t=document.getElementById(\"datawrapper-chart-\"+e)||document.querySelector(\"iframe[src*='\"+e+\"']\");t&&(t.style.height=a.data[\"datawrapper-height\"][e]+\"px\")}}))}();</script></div><p>Some states, like California, Colorado, Hawaii, Nebraska, Oregon, and Utah, <a href=\"https://www.ncsl.org/research/elections-and-campaigns/secrecy-of-the-ballot-and-ballot-selfies.aspx?utm_source=ActiveCampaign&utm_medium=email&utm_content=Zippy+News%3A+Announcing+the+NCFR+Olson+Grant&utm_campaign=Zippy+News+-+1%2F29%2F2020%2F29%2F2020\">have recently updated their laws</a> for the social media age by enacting legislation to explicitly allow voters to post pictures of their marked ballots, while other states have passed laws further restricting photography and phone use at polling place, <a href=\"https://www.ncsl.org/research/elections-and-campaigns/secrecy-of-the-ballot-and-ballot-selfies.aspx?utm_source=ActiveCampaign&utm_medium=email&utm_content=Zippy+News%3A+Announcing+the+NCFR+Olson+Grant&utm_campaign=Zippy+News+-+1%2F29%2F2020%2F29%2F2020\">according to the National Conference of State Legislatures.&#160;</a></p><p>Issues around ballot selfies have also been recently been litigated in court.&#160;</p><p>After New Hampshire passed a law explicitly banning ballot selfies on social media in 2014, <a href=\"http://indepthnh.org/2017/04/03/nh-ballot-selfies-remain-legal-as-u-s-supreme-court-declines-review/\">it was struck down by a federal appeals court</a>, which ruled that the law violated the 1st Amendment right to freedom of speech, and that lawmakers had insufficient evidence to prove that such a measure was necessary to prevent vote-buying.&#160;</p><p>David Levine, the election security fellow at <a href=\"https://securingdemocracy.gmfus.org/author/david-levine/\">the Alliance for Securing Democracy</a> and a former election official in Idaho and Washington, DC, told Insider that the debate over ballot selfies is likely to become even more potent in the future as voting from home becomes a more accessible and popular option to cast a ballot.&#160;</p><p>\"There are some folks who express concern about ballot secrecy and coercion, but there are others who say that people who want to should be able to take that risk...of losing their own right to privacy,\" Levine said. \"It's really important for voters to have a real understanding of what doing something like that entails and what applicable state laws are in place.\"</p><p>While rules around ballot selfies can be difficult to enforce and it's rare for states to prosecute voters for posting photos of their ballots, you'll want to make sure not to do anything that could lead to your vote being challenged or even thrown out.&#160;</p><p>In the 2016 election, pop star Justin Timberlake <a href=\"https://www.cnn.com/2016/10/26/entertainment/justin-timberlake-selfie/index.html\">caused a stir</a> by taking a selfie of him casting his ballot while voting early in his hometown of Memphis, which could have run the risk of violating a state ban on voters taking photographs in polling places.&#160;</p><p>In addition to laws against publicly showing how you voted, there are many states that restrict voters from taking pictures or using their cellphones within polling locations themselves to protect the privacy of other voters and their voting choices.&#160;</p><p>\"As a former state and local election official, another thing we had to sometimes deal with too was not only just somebody capturing a picture of their ballot, but also what else they might capture a picture of in the polling place that<br>could run the risk of capturing other people's information,\" Levine said.&#160;</p><p>Even before the pandemic, election officials have cautioned that voters taking time to snap photos or selfies at polls could lead to longer lines and less efficient service at in-person voting locations.&#160;</p><p>This year, with many localities likely to have fewer in-person voting locations available due to the pandemic, election officials are encouraging voters to be as mindful as possible of how much time they take to vote — including getting the perfect angle and lighting for a selfie.&#160;</p><bi-shortcode id=\"expanded-coverage\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-source=\"insider-voter-guide\" data-show-header=\"true\">Expanded Coverage Module: insider-voter-guide</bi-shortcode><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a border=\"0\"></img></a> <a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=JuEMoC-yZM4:dH7EKW0UAiU:V_sGLiPBpWU\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=JuEMoC-yZM4:dH7EKW0UAiU:V_sGLiPBpWU\" border=\"0\"></img></a> <a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=JuEMoC-yZM4:dH7EKW0UAiU:qj6IDK7rITs\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs\" border=\"0\"></img></a> <a border=\"0\"></img></a>\n</div><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/JuEMoC-yZM4\" height=\"1\" width=\"1\" alt=\"\"/>","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Thu, 08 Oct 2020 20:01:14 +0000","feedId":22,"bgimg":"https://i.insider.com/5f7b5b9494fce90018f7b257?format=jpeg","linkMd5":"6c73e201ba970b227dd374be724ea24b","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx11/cdn20@2020_6/2020/10/09/03-33-24-321_a1eb118565b546c9.webp","destWidth":1240,"destHeight":930,"sourceBytes":54280,"destBytes":54280,"author":"gpanetta@businessinsider.com (Grace Panetta,Yuqing Liu)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/5f7f64e10f9900001939ee77?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx24/cdn81@2020_4/2020/10/09/03-33-24-644_1085c004a6b73d80.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":null,"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=JuEMoC-yZM4:dH7EKW0UAiU:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn56@2020_6/2020/10/09/03-33-34-658_9aefe4694b07070e.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=JuEMoC-yZM4:dH7EKW0UAiU:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx15/cdn21@2020_5/2020/10/09/03-33-28-832_d04e189f917f3629.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn41@2020_4/2020/10/09/03-33-30-246_740defb435ea442b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=JuEMoC-yZM4:dH7EKW0UAiU:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx19/cdn56@2020_1/2020/10/09/03-33-26-675_04587edcf1c41a81.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/JuEMoC-yZM4":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx2/cdn11@2020_3/2020/10/09/03-33-35-081_125a6edae7625ffb.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1602214360895},{"createdTime":"2020-10-09 11:32:40","updatedTime":"2020-10-09 11:32:40","title":"You can get a free Hulu subscription with Spotify, but only if you're a college student — here's what you need to know","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-get-hulu-with-spotify","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f7f5ee10f9900001939ee55?format=jpeg\" alt=\"spotify mac computer\" height=\"1249\" width=\"2500\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>The Hulu with Spotify plan is easy to sign up for — if you qualify.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Shutterstock</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li><strong>Students can get Hulu with Spotify and Showtime for only $4.99 a month.</strong></li>\n<li><strong>To qualify for this deal, you can't have an existing Hulu No Ads plan, and you have to be a college student.</strong></li>\n<li><strong>To sign up for the Hulu with Spotify plan, you'll need to sign up for Spotify Premium for Student.</strong></li>\n<li>This story is a part of Business Insider's&#160;<a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-use-hulu-tips-and-tricks\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-module=\"summary_bullets\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"0\">Guide to Hulu Tips and Tricks</a>.</li>\n</ul><p><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/category/spotify\">Spotify</a> occasionally runs promotional deals, which make a subscription to the music service more attractive to subscribers.&#160;</p><p>In the summer of 2019, for a limited time, <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/category/spotify\">Spotify Premium</a> subscribers could get a <a href=\"https://hulu.com/start/affiliate?cmp=8869\" rel=\"nofollow\">Hulu</a> subscription at no additional cost. That offer has since expired, and it's no longer possible to sign up for this combination plan.&#160;</p><p>Instead, it's now possible for students to get both <a href=\"https://hulu.com/start/affiliate?cmp=8869\" rel=\"nofollow\">Hulu</a> and Showtime included in their <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/category/spotify\">Spotify Premium</a> subscription. However, there are a number of caveats to the deal that you should keep in mind.</p><h3><strong>Check out the products mentioned in this article:</strong></h3><h4><a href=\"https://hulu.com/start/affiliate?cmp=8869\" rel=\"nofollow\">Hulu Basic Subscription (From $5.99 per month at Hulu)</a></h4><h2><strong>How to get Hulu and Showtime with Spotify</strong></h2><p>If you're eligible for a Spotify Premium for Students subscription, you can get Spotify, <a href=\"https://hulu.com/start/affiliate?cmp=8869\" rel=\"nofollow\">Hulu's ad-supported plan</a>, and Showtime for $4.99 per month.&#160;</p><p>To get the deal, apply for <a href=\"https://www.spotify.com/us/student/\">Spotify Premium for Students</a>.</p><p>To qualify for the deal, you need to be \"enrolled at a US Title IV accredited college or university, and above the age of 18,\" according to <a href=\"https://www.spotify.com/us/student/\">Spotify</a>. You'll need to log in to apply for the deal using your college or university's portal, <em>or</em> upload a proof of enrollment when completing the online form. This can be a student ID, transcript, or enrollment letter.&#160;</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5dcadcbe3afd37286b11c2c5?format=jpeg\" alt=\"hulu 1\" height=\"1801\" width=\"1838\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>You need to provide proof of student status when you sign up for the deal.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Dave Johnson/Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p>Also, in order to get the Hulu and Showtime subscriptions included, you need to meet these criteria:</p><ul><li>You can't currently be subscribed to Hulu (No Ads). If you have the No Ads version of Hulu, you need to change to the ad supported plan and wait for the billing cycle to end before attempting to get the Spotify deal. Or you can make a new Hulu account.</li><li>You can't have any Hulu add-ons like Showtime or HBO. If you want to use your existing Hulu account, you'll need to drop these add-ons before proceeding.&#160;</li><li>You need to pay for Hulu directly, and not be billed though a service like Roku. If you're subscribed to Hulu through Roku, you'll need to cancel that subscription before proceeding.&#160;</li></ul><p>For more details on how you'll be billed and when, you should check out <a href=\"https://www.spotify.com/us/student/\">Spotify's official page on the Student deal</a>.</p><h2><strong>Related coverage from&#160;<a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/tech-reference\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"100\">Tech Reference</a>:</strong></h2><ul><li><h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-cancel-hulu-free-trial\">How to cancel your Hulu free trial so you don't get charged for a paid subscription</a></h3></li><li><h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/does-hulu-have-espn\" data-analytics-position=\"1\">'Does
